Implementation Engineer
Job description Duties & Responsibilities:
Install and implement customers in SmartVista processing systems
Certificete customers in payment networks like MC, Visa, Amex, UPI, etc..
Setup standard and non standard connections to different banking core systems
Diagnosing software problems, localization of the problem’s sources, identifying the bugs
Test installations and new releases / updates
Knowledge, Skills and Abilities:
Knowledge of SQL/PLSQL (able to to write SQL scripts is a must
Knowledge of Java programming is advantage
Knowledge of Unix/Linux operation systems as a confident user
Knowledge of payment industry standards such as ISO8583, SOAP or XML
Experience with various testing tools such as MAS, VTS and others
Knowledge in payment networks, technologies implementation and procedures (Visa/MC/Amex)
Knowledge of the operating principles, rules and day-to-day processes of card companies
Self-Motivated
Positive attitude
Understanding J2EE (WebLogic) is an advantage
Oracle database administration
Understanding of basic principles of e-commerce / e-payments and cards payments technologies
Requirements:
Three or more years experience with software development or support
Experience in Banking and Finance, Payments industry
Experience in payment and card processing software
College degree preferred
Courses certificates in a technical related field such as ORACLE, Unix is advantage
English - fluent
What you need to do now
If you're interested in this role, click 'apply now' to forward an up-to-date copy of your CV, or call us now.
If this job isn't quite right for you but you are looking for a new position, please contact us for a confidential discussion on your career.

SAP Consultant (PP)
Responsibilities
ABAP Programming in the Production Logistics area
Create IT concepts and functional specifications
Provide support for the SAP PP applications for different locations
Analyze of reported Incidents and define rapid solutions for the production
Test and Documentation of new program developments
Technical Rollout of existing PP-templates to other locations
Coordination of work packages in projects as well as small orders
Our client is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility. With its comprehensive technology portfolio, the company offers integrated solutions for established vehicle manufacturers, mobility providers and start-up companies in the fields of transportation and mobility.
Requirements
Degree in (Business) Informatics
More than 3 years of experience in development of SAP solutions - ABAP and ABAP OO
Knowledge of SAP logistics processes, ideally PP
Flexibility and good team player
Good communication skills, including the virtual team environment
Advantages
S/4 HANA, FIORI/UI5 skills are appreciated, as well as APO- PP/DS or IBP Know How
Willingness to travel
German language knowledge appreciated
​Offer
Stable company background and long-term working possibility
Full of challenges and high-level professional activities at an international company
Participation in international projects and commission to foreign countries
Career opportunities, continuous training program and language courses
Competitive salary and performance-related bonus
Cafeteria with optional elements
Home office work
School start support

Leírás
Megbízó partnerünk számára keresünk munkatársat, Medior / Senior C++ Software Developer pozícióba szegedi lokációval. Partnerünk Európa egyik legnagyobb mérnöki és technológiai csoportja, Magyarország vezető informatikai cége.
C++ Software Developer
Feladatok

Alkalmazkodás az új operációs rendszerhez vagy a környezet egyéb változásaihoz,

Német tudás,
Windows ismeretek,

Ipari automatizálás területén szerzett tapasztalat,
Rational Clear Case vagy más konfigurációkezelő rendszerben szerzett tapasztalat.
Amit kínálunk
Vonzó kompenzációs csomag,
Magán egészségbiztosítás a Medicovernél,
Home office lehetőség és rugalmas munkaidő,

Modern munkakörnyezet,

Java Developer (Budapest)
Java Developer (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Hays Hungary Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Java Developer
Your new company
Would you like to work with one of the leading investment companies? Develop yourself and your career in a highly multicultural and giving environment – as a Java Developer!
Your new role
spearheading the development of backend stack, architecting, and building backend projects,
being involved in inception to delivery of various features and products on a results-oriented and exciting product roadmap,
working with project managers, technical leads, business owners, and analysts through the entire SDLC, understanding and refining systems requirements, working in Agile model,
participating in setting coding standards and guidelines for web applications, identify and detail best practices,
helping the team continuously improve processes and ways of working,
being curious and eager to learn new things,
willing to embrace work outside of your comfort zone, and open to mentorship from others; you make mistakes, but learn from them,
being passionate about technology, with personal ownership for the work you do.
What you'll need to succeed
3+ years hands-on Java development experience with services-oriented architectures and Java application servers (JBoss, Apache, Spring Framework)
Experience with Test Driven Development (JUnit, TestNG, EasyMock, JMock)
Ability of writing clean, future proof code with proper unit testing
Knowledge of at least one distributed version control system ideally Git
Good written and verbal communication skills in English
Understanding the Agile project management disciplines, with an emphasis on Scrum
Strong teamwork, communication, and time management abilities
Is a plus:
Experience with Docker/Kubernetes and Helm
Experience with Azure DevOps
Experience with frameworks like Angular, React, Node.js, Typescript
Knowledge of the core JavaScript and solid understanding of at least one JavaScript libraries like rxjs or ngrx
Solid understanding and experience of HTML 5 and CSS
What you'll get in return
Our partner provides support in any formal and informal way possible:
competitive salary package, cafeteria, private health insurance,
training and a mentor program for a smooth start, further soft and hard skill trainings on the long term,
an open, friendly and multinational atmosphere in a brand new modern office in the city centre,
home office opportunity in a hybrid way.
Gain profitable insights in software development and build your career at our partner as a Java developer!
What you need to do now
If you're interested in this role, click 'apply now' to forward an up-to-date copy of your CV, or call us now.
If this job isn't quite right for you but you are looking for a new position, please contact us for a confidential discussion on your career.

System administrator (german speaking)
On-site (80% - Germany) and remote (20%) support of power-plant automation systems
Ensure the functionality the availability of the installed equipment
Execution of installations, updates, upgrades, increments, and migrations of the technical control system
Analyze system incidents via remote access and directly on-site and make all necessary corrections
Our partner is a major company in the energy industry. They are involved in various power generation technologies such as gas turbines, hybrid power plants, generators, and transformers. They also provide modern and sustainable solutions for energy transport and storage. We are looking for a system administrator to join their team.
Technical Service Desk or IT Support experience
Basic fundamentals of operating systems, networking
Fluent German and intermediate English knowledge

Attractive salary

Feliratkozás ›
Sikeres regisztráció!
Kérjük, aktiváld a felhasználói fiókodat: A megadott e-mail címre elküldtük a megerősítő linket.
Ezt követően feltöltheted az önéletrajzodat és beállíthatod, hogy milyen állásokról szeretnél értesítést kapni.
Sikeres álláskeresést kívánunk!
Sikeres regisztráció!
Köszönjük, hogy regisztráltál! Még aktiválnod kell a kiküldött e-mail-ben szereplő linkre kattintva! 
A nyereménysorsolásban csak aktivált fiókkal veszel részt. (Ha a beérkező levelek között nem találod, nézd meg a „Levélszemét” mappát is.)
Sikeres álláskeresést kívánunk!
Sikeres aktiválás!
Köszönjük, hogy aktiváltad Jobline fiókodat és Álláspostádat! Részt veszel a nyereménysorsolásban.
Töltsd fel önéletrajzodat a Jobline-ra, hogy MOBILON is jelentkezhess állásainkra, és hogy a munkaadók megtalálhassanak neked való állásajánlatokkal!
Sikeres álláskeresést kívánunk!
Új Állásposta beállítva!
Köszönjük, hogy új Álláspostát állítottál be, ezzel részt veszel a nyereménysorsoláson. A nyerteseket e-mailben értesítjük. 
Töltsd fel önéletrajzodat a Jobline-ra, hogy MOBILON is jelentkezhess állásainkra, és hogy a munkaadók megtalálhassanak neked való állásajánlatokkal!
Sikeres álláskeresést kívánunk!

 Belépés ›
Rendszerszervező (Magyarország)
Rendszerszervező (Magyarország)
A hirdetés már lejárt!
Karrier Hungária
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
5+ év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
Rendszerszervező
Partnerünk telematika területén a leginnovatívabb magyar vállalat. Számtalan izgalmas hazai és nemzetközi projekten dolgoznak, amelyekhez most új munkatársat keresnek.
Feladatok:
Szakértői erőforrásbecslés és a feladat leszállítható egységekre bontása
Átfogó tervdokumentációk készítése
Követelmény specifikáció (PRD) készítése, valamint funkcionális (FSD) specifikáció készítése a vezető fejlesztőkkel közösen
Fejlesztés koordinálása - scrum masterrel és fejlesztői csapattal való együttműködés
Release folyamat koordinálása szoros együttműködésben az üzemeltetőkkel és fejlesztőkkel
Rendszerarchitektúra tervezésének támogatása
Eredmény dokumentációk készítése
Éles rendszerek folyamatos üzleti- és technikai támogatása
Elvárások:
Felsőfokú végzettség
Legalább 5 éves IT szervezői tapasztalat
UML vagy BPMN - folyamat modellezésben és rendszertervek készítésében szerzett több éves tapasztalat
Integrált, nagy rendelkezésre állású, nagy terhelésű rendszerek tervezésében szerzett tapasztalat
API teszteszközök ismerete (pl: SoapUI; Postman)
Ticketing rendszer ismerete (pl. Jira)
Verziókezelők ismerete (pl. SVN, Git)
SQL nyelv magas szintű ismerete, valamelyik SQL fejlesztőeszköz készség szintű ismerete (pl. SQL Developer, Toad)
Adatbázis, interfész és UI felület tervezésében tapasztalat
Kiváló problémafelismerő és megoldó készség
Eredményorientált üzleti gondolkodás
Rendszerszintű gondolkodásmód
Önálló és csapatban való munkavégzés
Ajánlatunk:
Változatos hazai és nemzetközi projektek a legmodernebb technológiákra alapozva (Enterprise környezet)
Üzletileg kritikus, magas rendelkezésre állású IT rendszerek fejlesztése (és üzemeltetése)
Komplex, felelősségteljes munka a rendszerek fejlesztésében
Szakmai képzéseken, konferenciákon való részvételi lehetőség
Stabil vállalat, fiatalos munkahely
Dinamikus, szakmailag tapasztalt, széles látókörű kollégák, csapat, vezetőség
Jól megközelíthető, felszerelt modern iroda
Versenyképes bérezés
Előnyök:
Felsőfokú végzettség informatikai vagy gazdaságinformatikai területen
Agilis módszerek és folyamatok aktív használata
Tervezési tapasztalat kapcsolódva az alábbi rétegekhez: 
Oracle vagy más RDBMS adatbázis 
Java EE backend 
XML/JSON alapú kommunikációban szerzett tapasztalat 
Angular frontend 
Alábbi eszközök ismerete: 
EA 
XMLSpy vagy hasonló eszköz 
Confluence 
IDE eszközök (Pl.: Eclipse, IntelliJ) 
Egyéb tapasztalatok: 
rendszer architektúrák ismerete (monolit, SOA, microservice) 
NoSQL adatbázisok ismerete (pl. MongoDB, etcd) 
Automata tesztelési eszközök ismerete (pl. JMeter) 
Logok elemzésében szerzett tapasztalat Linux környezetben (pl. less, tail, grep…) 
CI toolok és folyamat tapasztalat (pl. Jenkins, GO) 
Virtualizációval, konténerizációval kapcsolatos tapasztalatok 
Kód olvasás valamilyen objektum orientált, vagy script nyelven 
Munkavégzés helye:
Magyarország
- 
Neked ajánlott állások

Senior IT projektvezető (Pápa)
Senior IT projektvezető (Pápa)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Hire-One Személyzeti Tanácsadó Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
középvezető
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
távmunka, home office
angol - középfokú
Legyünk együtt sikeresek!
Partnerünk nemzetközi tulajdonban lévő, bővülő gyártó vállalat.
Részükre keresünk ÚJ kollégát, az alábbi pozícióba:
Senior IT projektvezető
Feladatok
A leendő kolléga IT projekteket fog koordinálni vagy részfeladatokat vállalni azokban: pl. logisztikai folyamatfejlesztések, ERP rendszerbevezetés és MES rendszerbevezetés;
Adatbázis szerver konfigurálása;
Lekérdezések készítése az ERP rendszerben, ill. a lekérdezések tesztelése;
ERP rendszer tesztelése;
MES rendszer fejlesztése, szorosan együttműködve a mérnökséggel;
Adatkinyerési módszerek kidolgozása, ezek tesztelése;
TISAX audit felkészülésben részvétel;
Projektköltségek figyelése.
Elvárások
Felsőfokú végzettség és releváns IT projektvezetői tapasztalat;
ERP és/vagy MES rendszerbevezetésben és/vagy IT rendszerek fejlesztésében szerzett tapasztalat;
Aktív angol nyelvtudás (sok esetben a megbeszélések ezen a nyelven lesznek);
Gyártó környezetben szerzett tapasztalat;
ERP rendszerek általános logisztikai folyamatainak ismerete.
Amit kínálunk
Work-life-balance, nem jellemző a túlóra és ha esetleg van is, akkor az kifizetésre kerül vagy lecsúsztatható;
Rugalmas munkaidő, törzsidővel;
Nettó 56 Ft/km útiköltség térítés;
13. havi bér;
Home-office lehetősége;
Képzési lehetőségek;
Egyéb juttatások (pl. dolgozói kedvezmények, Mikulás csomag, Húsvéti csomag);
Befogadó csapat.
Munkavégzés helye
Pápa
Jelentkezés módja
"Küldje el jelentkezését a „Jelentkezem az állásra most” gombra való kattintással! A fényképes önéletrajzokat magyar és idegen nyelven várjuk. Kérjük, a levél tárgyába írja be a pozíció nevét és a referencia számát. Köszönjük! Hire-One Személyzeti Tanácsadó Kft. Nyilvántartási szám: 3376-1/2008."

Java Developer (Budapest)
Java Developer (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Junior Java Developer
What you will do in the first three months:
Study the necessary technologies according to an individual development plan;
Practical study of new material;
Complete internship involving real projects with the application of the studied technologies
Our partner is a global supplier of software engineering and IT outsourcing services, and they are looking for a Junior PHP Developer. You’ll be part of a team of professionals who are ready to find the best tailor-made IT solutions for their multinational clients in various industries and solve complex problems.
You will be successful in this role if you have: 
Learnability, engineering thinking, positive mindset, and persistence to achieve the goal;
Confident technical English—ability to understand English documentation and formulate and express your thoughts in English;
Excellent knowledge of OOP, particularly in Java;
Working with database (relational or NoSQL) skills;
Principles of web applications and HTML and CSS knowledge;
Working with Git or other version control system skills;
Working with automatic project building system skills (maven, Gradle)
Will be a plus:
Knowledge of Spring and Hibernate frameworks;
Knowledge of JavaScript and basic frameworks such as Angular or React
We offer:
Stable long-term work environment;
Competitive salary with a flexible system of revisions;
Benefits and social packages;
Comfortable A+ office in Budapest;
Every necessary tool and device in the office will be provided to comfortably perform all project tasks: computers, meeting rooms, spacious modern kitchens with professional coffee machines, comfortable recreation areas with game consoles, board games, and a selection of literature for every taste;
Paid English courses and conversation clubs;
Opportunities for professional and personal growth;
Mentoring program, internal and external professional training programs;
Support and care from our client's friendly team
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest
Jelentkezem az állásra ›

Sikeres regisztráció!
Kérjük, aktiváld a felhasználói fiókodat: A megadott e-mail címre elküldtük a megerősítő linket.
Ezt követően feltöltheted az önéletrajzodat és beállíthatod, hogy milyen állásokról szeretnél értesítést kapni.
Sikeres álláskeresést kívánunk!
Sikeres regisztráció!
Köszönjük, hogy regisztráltál! Még aktiválnod kell a kiküldött e-mail-ben szereplő linkre kattintva! 
A nyereménysorsolásban csak aktivált fiókkal veszel részt. (Ha a beérkező levelek között nem találod, nézd meg a „Levélszemét” mappát is.)
Sikeres álláskeresést kívánunk!
Sikeres aktiválás!
Köszönjük, hogy aktiváltad Jobline fiókodat és Álláspostádat! Részt veszel a nyereménysorsolásban.
Töltsd fel önéletrajzodat a Jobline-ra, hogy MOBILON is jelentkezhess állásainkra, és hogy a munkaadók megtalálhassanak neked való állásajánlatokkal!
Sikeres álláskeresést kívánunk!
Új Állásposta beállítva!
Köszönjük, hogy új Álláspostát állítottál be, ezzel részt veszel a nyereménysorsoláson. A nyerteseket e-mailben értesítjük. 
Töltsd fel önéletrajzodat a Jobline-ra, hogy MOBILON is jelentkezhess állásainkra, és hogy a munkaadók megtalálhassanak neked való állásajánlatokkal!

Software Test Engineer (Budapest)
Software Test Engineer (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Software Test Engineer
The following challenges await our new Software Test Engineer:
Execution of tests using HIL (Hardware-In-the-Loop) simulators in the field of conventional and hybrid truck transmissions
Manual and automated evaluation of measurements (using Vector tools such as CANape, CANalyzer; FAMOS)
Development and execution of automated tests
Documentation and presentation of test results
Improvement of tests and testing strategies
Collaboration in an international team
Our partner is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility. With its comprehensive technology portfolio, the company offers integrated solutions for established vehicle manufacturers, mobility providers and start-up companies in the fields of transportation and mobility.
The requirements you should fulfill:
University/College degree in Vehicle Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Mechatronics, Mechanical Engineering, or Computer Science
Good command of English and/or German, both written and spoken
Basic knowledge/understanding of coding, scripting, programming (Python, C, C#, C++ or other)
It's an advantage if you also have:
Experience in automotive function or system development
User-level knowledge of Matlab / Simulink, Vector tools (CANalyzer, CANape development tools)
Category C driving license
What our partner offers:
Participation in international projects and missions abroad
Training programs and language courses opportunities
Excellent workplace atmosphere and attractive working environment
Competitive salary, performance-related bonus and cafeteria
Different sports options
School start support
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest

Senior Fullstack Developer (Java/Angular) (Budapest)
Senior Fullstack Developer (Java/Angular) (Budapest)
A hirdetés már lejárt!
Hays Hungary Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Senior Fullstack Developer (Java/Angular)
PT&I Software Engineer
Introduction
Hello software engineer! Are you ready to help us to become the most data & technology-driven airline in the world? And are you ready to impact the (working) life of more than 26,000 KLM employees? We would love to get to know you!
What are you going to do?
By applying your excellent coding and problem solving skills, and by being a strong team player, you will make the (working) life of more than 26,000 KLM employees better every day. As a t-shaped software engineer you design, build, improve, deliver, maintain and support the software applications in our business platform. Next to that your contribution will help us to be(come) a truly data & technology driven organization. Next to your engagement in communities of practice, 10% of your time will be dedicated to research and self-study, giving you the opportunity to further develop yourself.
More specifically the product team responsible for recruitment and onboarding is looking for you to help us create a new, and greatly improved, career website. You will be given the opportunity to build a best-in-class experience to truly make an impact.
Where do you land?
You will be working in the Data & Technology business platform "People, Technology & Intelligence" (Human Resources). As one of the software engineers in your (Scrum) team you will work from our head office in Amstelveen (next to that we are working from home part of the time). As a team, of around ten people, you will work closely with business and the other teams in the platform.
Your profile
You have proven to be an experienced, t-shaped software engineer who likes to work in both frontend (Angular) and backend (Java). With your strong knowledge about software development and technologies & methodologies you focus on building high quality applications that are maintainable, performant and secure. Being the senior software engineer of the team, you can support the product owner and others in the team. You are taking the lead on technical topics and you make sure that we, in collaboration with vendors and other teams, deliver excellent digital products.
You are a colleague that is great and fun to work with. You have strong communication skills and you like to work in an international environment with lots of cultural diversity. You are result driven, customer oriented and flexible to change. Although it would be great if you have all the technical skills mentioned below, we find it more important that you are pro-active, a good learner and an enthusiast for modern technology.
Furthermore, you:
know frontend development using JavaScript/Typescript, HTML5, CSS3+ and Angular;
know backend development using Java (8/11+) and Spring (Boot);
have knowledge of modern software engineering practices (clean code, design patterns);
know both SQL and no-SQL databases such as PostgreSQL and MongoDB;
know integration patterns such as SOA, request/reply (RESTful API's) and event driven architecture (JMS/Kafka);
know cloud technologies and DevOps (git, CI/CD, Azure, Kubernetes, Docker, Tomcat);
have in-depth knowledge and experience in the agile way of working (SAFe, Scrum, Kanban);
are fluent in English (Dutch is a plus).
What we offer besides an attractive salary
a challenging role at an unique employer;
plenty of room for personal development and wonderful career opportunities;
lots of freedom in tools, working hours and location;
a MacBook/laptop;
a good pension scheme;
an end of the year bonus up to 10%
profit sharing
great discounts on airline tickets (if you have been in service for at least 6 months);
a travel expenses scheme and a quarterly duty trip to Amsterdam
discount on your health insurance;
a personal budget for sustainable employability.
Are you ready for take-off?
Don’t wait any longer, send us your resume! A motivation letter is not required; we will simply ask you a couple of questions during your online application. Within two weeks you will receive a message from us. The recruitment procedure will consist of two interviews and a technical case.
Neked ajánlott állások

Network Engineer (Magyarország)
Network Engineer (Magyarország)
A hirdetés már lejárt!
Randstad Hungary Kft
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Középfokú végzettség
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - felsőfokú
Our partner is a well known technology company, with almost 2,000 employees worldwide, our client's Controls and Digitalization teams has a global presence. Their team focuses on providing value-added services and solutions to our customers in the areas of control, digitization, automation and electrical equipment. 
Network Engineer
Feladatok
Supporting our client's automation control system development and closely collaborating with the sales & bid manager
Configuration of switches/routers/firewalls under consideration of IT security requirements, commissioning of these as well as ensuring error-free functioning of the network during unit and system tests  
Preparation of technical specifications and documentation regarding communication and IT security in the projects 
Követelmények
Several years of professional experience of network OR IT security
Very good knowledge of LAN/WAN, TCP/IP, switching, routing, VPN and RF technologies as well as IT-Security concepts, standards, and hardening measures 
Knowledge in configuration of the hardware components related to switching/routing/firewall (Cisco, Ruggedcom, Checkpoint, Scalance switches and firewalls, etc.) 
Willingness for business trips (in total <30% per year) 
Fluent language skills in English
Amit kínálunk
Opportunity to have an active engineering role on future handling complex projects with a high digitalization level
Working with an international teams and business environments
Excellent opportunity for professional development on a new tailored organization
Competitive benefit package (basic salary, bonus, daily allowance for travelling periods)

Medior Android fejlesztőt keresünk banki projektekre! Alkalmazotti, remote munka!
/* Izgalmas projektek - Android, Kotlin fejlesztés - Hibrid munkavégzés */
Partnerünk banki digitális csatornák fejlesztésében végez úttörő szerepet és teremt modernebb, felhasználóbarátabb folyamatot ügyfelei számára. Érdekelnek izgalmas projektek, ahol a teljes termékfejlesztési folyamatnak lehetsz részese? Csatlakozz csapatukhoz!
Feladatok:
Android alkalmazások és könyvtárak fejlesztése csapatban, ahol mindig van saját felelősségi kör is
Projekt tervezési feladataiba való bekapcsolódás lehetősége
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest, 9. ker és HO

Java Developer (Budapest)
Java Developer (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Java Developer
Tasks:
Commercial Software Engineers are T-shaped professionals.
As Commercial Software Engineer, you take care of specification, design, engineering, testing, delivering, deploying, maintaining, and supporting digital products.
The ability to deliver code in one or more programming languages is at the core of the job.
As a T-shaped professional you brings deep expertise in one or more crafts and proficiency in other crafts.
In the product team, the Commercial Software Engineers together secure all the skills, knowledge and experience on analysis, design and architecture, development, quality assurance, DevOps, LCM and operational support as needed.
Depending on the service level agreements (SLA) the Commercial Software Engineer can be asked to participate in consignation duties, for example if 24/7 support is agreed. 
We value both technical expertise (analysis, design and architecture, engineering, quality assurance and DevPps) as well as the interpersonal parts of the job (coaching, consulting, coordination, and support).
Our Client is a leading European airline. Their IT is a strong mature agile organization with over 1.000 internal employees worldwide – but they are starting fresh in Budapest with a new start-up this year.
Are you looking for a chance to work in truly European spirit with their future technological developments?
Together you fly 110 aircraft to 145 destinations, bringing millions of passengers to where they need to be, developing sustainable travel and pushing the boundaries of air travel towards to the future.
Skills:
Bachelor or Master degree level or higher in Computer Science, Software Engineering or other relevant fields through study or IT experience
2 - 4 years of experience building production-grade software
3 years of expertise in Java/J2EE, Spring, Spring Boot, Kotlin, Knowledge of API management, handling SOAP services and REST API, Hibernate, Maven, Docker, Kubernetes, Groovy, Git, Jenkins, Ready API
Identity and Access Management, Storn in Oauth 2, good knowledge in application and endpoint security
Experience with Unit testing, Contract based testing, release-on-demand concepts and automated build tools (e.g. Bamboo)
Code Quality maintenance ( Sonar, Performance/LOAD Testing , Integration Testing , Security Scanning )
Being able to engineer for Azure
Practical experience and a strong theoretical basis for dealing with complex architectures
Curiosity to discover the complex domain processes
Proactive attitude
Good communication skills, written and spoken (English)
Great team player that can work well as part of a diverse, international team
Agile mindset
Nice to have:
OPEN ID connect, microservices, DevOps CICD, Mongo DB, Redis cache, Dynatrace, Oracle PL/SQL,
Java script, Message brokers Active and Kafka
A challenging role at an unique employer in the Netherlands
Plenty of room for personal development and wonderful career opportunities
A good pension scheme, end of the year bonus, and profit sharing
Great discounts on airline tickets (if you have been in service for at least 6 months)
A travel expenses scheme and a quarterly duty trip to Amsterdam
Discount on your health insurance
A personal budget for sustainable employability
Munkavégzés helye:
Budapest

Confident Role (Budapest)

Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Hays Hungary Kft.

angol - középfokú
Confident Role
We are looking for an IT Engineering Manager with the profile below.
Our IT Engineering team is responsible for the development, operation and support of a variety of internal tools, either developed in-house or third-party ones. Part of the team fulfils a global function and supports users globally. This part of the team is technically lead by managers in the parent company (based in Liechtenstein).
Roles and responsibilities:
- Line management of all members of the IT Engineering Team
- Technical leadership of the team
- Liaison with technical counterparts from the parent company based in Liechtenstein
- Own and develop the technical strategy of the team
- Project portfolio management
- Project management of high profile projects
- Development of the team
- Performance management of the team
- Regular reporting to the Head of IT
Must have requirements:
- Solid people management skills
- Performance management experience at team level and at individual level
- Project management experience
- Good communication skills with different (technical, non-technical) parties and at the right level of detail
- Ability to communicate a vision to the team
- General IT background
- Background both in software engineering and operational topics
- Exposure to Agile methodologies
- Experience with Linux (command line)
- Experience with relational databases
- Understanding how support organisations work
- Can do attitude
- Problem solving
- Can perform under pressure
- Good English (written and oral)
- University degree or equivalent
- Willingness to travel occasionally
Nice to have requirements:
- German language
- Work experience in an international environment
- Experience with CI/CD
- Experience with container orchestration

Software Engineering Manager (Budapest)
Software Engineering Manager (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Hays Hungary Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
középvezető
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Software Engineering Manager
Our international partner is looking for a talented Software Engineering Manager to join their growing team. The candidate will have excellent leadership skills for teams and engineering, and report to the Senior Operations Manager. She/He will work on the management, execution, design, software development and releases of our world-class electric mobility control and interface systems.
Key Accountabilities / Responsibilities:
Lead a software team developing safety-critical and mobility-focused embedded software
Lead new strategies and develop adaptions to existing algorithms for vehicle motion control, user interfaces, API's, actuator and energy management with the software development team
Manage implementation of systems tests, debugging and diagnostics and analyse resulting data
Manage a team planning, designing, and optimizing automated test cases and CI/CD pipelines with the software test team
Participate in design and code reviews within our software development lifecycle
Generate and analyse requirements and specifications from stakeholders
Collaborate with other software engineers, electrical, mechanical, systems, and product teams to deliver solutions
Requirements
An Engineering or Computer Science degree, or equivalent experience
A passionate interest in electric transport and an interest in developing new generations of electric vehicles
Proven experience in building and releasing production software packages in ECU's or controllers in relevant engineering projects
Proficiency in embedded software development in C/C++, and model-based development in Simulink
Proficiency with automotive or industrial communications such as CAN and Ethernet
Experience with the v-model automotive software development lifecycle
Experience with software functional safety implementations and preferably, ISO26262 certifications
Strong understanding of vehicle dynamics, control theory and sensors
Enjoy working in a fast-paced and growing global team environment
Ability to work independently with a strong team ethos
Capable of mentoring engineers in the software engineering domain
Minimum of 15 years of experience in software development in industry
Proficient in Hungarian and English
Other useful experience
A general knowledge of embedded electronics development and the ability to read schematic diagrams
Understanding of the standards of functional safety ISO26262, IEC61508 and/or ASIL
Technical experience related to electronic systems at a component, sub-system and system level
An ability to analyse test results, highlight abnormalities and present outcomes to an audience with a range of technical expertise
Cross functional knowledge across the disciplines of electronics, mechatronics, and software
Experienced with Microsoft Office suite
Strong interpersonal and communication skills
Benefits
Work at an exciting technology company within Hungary delivering globally in a multi-national group
Enjoy a clear sense of ownership in your field, with the satisfaction of working on developments that create the future of a new category of autonomous vehicles
Work alongside a friendly and passionate team on cutting edge technology
Have the opportunity to travel to other company offices including Australia and the UK
Enjoy modern office space and great work environment

DevOps Lead (Debrecen/Budapest) (Magyarország)
DevOps Lead (Debrecen/Budapest) (Magyarország)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
középvezető
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
DevOps Lead
The DevOps lead will be responsible for leading and guiding a team of devops engineers across IST, HU and CST timezones
They must have proven leadership experience and be able to coach and grow their team whilst also being hands on and able to troubleshoot issues, unblock the team and
think about long term vision of the area/what needs to be improved
Our international client is looking for a motivated and dynamic DevOps Lead to join their team.
Our partner is a strategic supplier to all restaurants, deploying in over 120 countries and over 37,500 locations worldwide. They provide software development, testing, deployment and support services for POS (point-of-sale) and related software applications that focus on the overall crew and customer experience, resulting in improved operations in the restaurants.
This role is a leadership role but also hands on - both are required
Must be an expert/have proven high level experience in AWS and all respective components
Must have proven experience and high expertise in terraform and using AWS as a cloud provider. IAC is a must
Strong knowledge in containers and container orchestration. Must be very strong in Kubernetes
Very strong understanding of CI/CD, ideally Jenkins as a tool of choice
Skilled in one or more programming languages such as Python, Ruby etc
Understanding of Java preferable but not mandatory
Thorough understanding of source control, git and trunk based dev
Experience in monitoring and dashboards, ideally new relic
Working knowledge of consul and Vault
Leadership/Softskills:
Able to lead, coach and mentor engineers of various levels of ability
Be comfortable presenting and teaching
Must be able to think about the bigger picture and create a roadmap/vision for
improving the area
International team made of young and dynamic people, who like to keep work-life balance in mind
Remote work opportunity with only a few days a month in the office
Trainings, conferences, language courses, and sport opportunities

SAP Consultant (Kistelek)

3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - felsőfokú
SAP Consultant
Tasks:
Supporting onsite three manufacturing sites coordinating projects related to SAP developments
Requirements assessment related to SAP-PP and SAP-MM modules
Transferring the current status and needs to the developers, then discussing the feasibility of the plans
Preparation of specifications (business blueprint), coordinating the implementation and customization processes
Participating in the development of functional design and configuration
Stakeholder management, project tracking, scheduling and follow-up 
Examining occurring ad-hoc issues, proposing actions to solve them 
Completing the roll-out process, conducting go-live, integrating the finished product into the client's systems
Follow-up, support and incident management duties after the delivery phase
Taking part in global SAP projects, in alignment with the global IT strategies 
Our partner is a market leader international company  with a stable history We are currently looking for an SAP Consultant supporting three manufacturing units.
Requirements:
1-3 years of SAP experience (SAP-PP, SAP-MM)
Experience in ABAP / ABAP-OO
Experience in customizing processes
Fluency in English 
“B” category driving license is a must for traveling to manufacturing sites 
Industrial process knowledge
Advantages:
Experience in SAP SCM (APO)
Offer:
Multinational environment, global responsibilities
Stable, market-leading corporate background
Competitive salary, bonus and other benefits
2 days Home Office / week
Democratic, open and direct corporate culture
Outstanding professional development opportunities, in-house career plan
Positive attitude, dynamic team
Munkavégzés helye
Kistelek

IT rendszerüzemeltető
Leírás
Dinamikusan fejlődő, stabil nemzetközi háttérrel rendelkező, autóipari megbízónk részére keresünk munkatársat.  IT rendszerüzemeltető  Feladatok Microsoft szerverek és munkaállomások, mobil készülékek és egyéb IT eszközök karbantartása, üzemeltetéseKliens számítógépek telepítése, konfigurálásaActive Directory felhasználói fiókok, csoportok kezeléseRendszerüzemeltetői feladatok elvégzése szerver és kliens oldalonÚj eszközök beszerzése, üzembe helyezése, karbantartása, nyilvántartásba vételeVállalati alkalmazások első szintű támogatásaBeérkező IT incidensek és problémák megoldásaKapcsolattartás és együttműködés a vállalat társosztályaival, dolgozóval és külsős partnerekkel  Elvárások  min. középfokú szakirányú végzettségmagabiztos, aktív angol nyelvtudás írásban és szóbanrendszerüzemeltetői tapasztalathálózati, kliens és szerver hardver, Active Directory, Windows Server 2016, Windows 10 és Office 365 rendszer, nyomtatók és mobil eszköz ismeretidőszakonkénti telefonos ügyeleti készenlét vállalásaB kategóriás jogosítványügyfélközpontúság, felelősségteljes munkavégzés, önállóságanalitikus gondolkodásmód, jó problémamegoldó képesség Előny:Microsoft SCCM, IIS és SQL szerver ismerethaladó (CISCO) hálózati ismeretszakirányú felsőfokú végzettség  Amit kínálunk  Versenyképes juttatási csomagCafeteria, bónuszkifizetésAlkalmankénti HO lehetőségFiatalos légkörFolyamatos szakmai képzésekDinamikusan fejlődő munkakörnyezetKöltöző jelölteket szívesen fogadnak

SAP MM consultant/analyst - focusing on inbound logistics (Budapest)
SAP MM consultant/analyst - focusing on inbound logistics (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
távmunka, home office
angol - középfokú
SAP MM consultant
Tasks
Provide application support to business users in the module MM/WM in ECC environments, excluding Purchasing specifics such as release strategies
Resolve system related problems via our Incident management process with solutions and documentation
Project/Demand resolution as a resource or lead, or both. This includes modifications of existing or design of new processes
Manage the implementation of application changes where needed via self-development or the creation of detailed technical specifications along with coordination and management of internal and external change providers
Proficient in documentation methodology, ability to adapt to ZF standards of documentation
Our client is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility. With its comprehensive technology portfolio, the company offers integrated solutions for established vehicle manufacturers, mobility providers and start-up companies in the fields of transportation and mobility.
Requirements
Degree in Informatics or related disciplines. Experience can be a substitution of degree.
1-3 years of experience in SAP process consulting, implementation, and support
Analysis and troubleshooting skills used to support SAP end users. Knowledge of testing procedures that ensure expected results and at least basic ABAP coding skill
Strong interpersonal and communication skills. Provide positive contributions to a team environment with the ability to work independently and handle multiple tasks simultaneously
Competency in supplier-related SAP interfaces such IDOCs for supply forecast, ASNs, and consignment
Able to communicate verbally and in written form in English to be able to work in an international team
Willingness and ability to travel worldwide (0-30% per year)
Advantages:
ABAP programming experience
Experience in S/4HANA
German language knowledge
We offer
Stable company background and long-term working possibility
Full of challenges and high-level professional activities at an international company
Participation in international projects and commission to foreign countries
Career opportunities, continuous training program and language courses
Competitive salary and performance-related bonus
Cafeteria with optional elements
Home office work
School start support
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest

Junior/Medior/Senior/Lead Szoftver tesztautomatizáló mérnök (Budapest)
Junior/Medior/Senior/Lead Szoftver tesztautomatizáló mérnök (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
Gyártás, műszaki terület
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
Szoftver tesztautomatizáló mérnök
Feladatok
A XI. kerületben található modern irodaházunkban kreatív környezetben dolgozhatsz, ahol sok színes közösségi tér, saját moziterem és egy skybar is vár
Rugalmas munkaidővel és home office lehetőséggel támogatunk (a legtöbb területen a havi munkaidő 60%-a)
Versenyképes fizetést és széleskörű juttatásokat (cafeteria és bónusz) biztosítunk számodra
Részese lehetsz egy sikeres, gyorsan növekvő technológiai vállalatnak
Új nyelveket tanulhatsz nálunk (5 nyelv közül választhatsz)
Szabadidős programokon kapcsolódhatsz ki (társasjátékok, sportolási lehetőség)
Ügyfelünk multinacionális háttérrel rendelkezik, ezáltal számos országban képviselteti magát. Légy részese egy olyan több mint 20 éves sikertörténetnek, amely Budapestről indult és vált nemzetközi szinten is egy meghatározó fejlesztési központtá az Ügyfelünk részeként. 
Elvárások
Beágyazott mikrokontrolleres rendszerek programjainak funkcionális és biztonsági ellenőrzésére szolgáló automatizált hardware-in-the-loop tesztek fejlesztése
A szoftvertesztek megtervezése, implementálása pythonban, futtatása, teszt naplók analízise, a tesztek karbantartása
Új szoftvertesztelési technológiák, módszerek és eljárások kidolgozása
A tesztelési dokumentáció elkészítése, átvizsgálása és karbantartása
Részvétel az szoftvertervezési dokumentácó átvizsgálásában
Folyamatos együttműködés a szoftverfejlesztőkkel, a problémák hatékony megoldásának támogatása
Amit kínálunk
Versenyképes fizetés és széles körű juttatások
Részvétel nemzetközi projektekben
Folyamatos szakmai fejlődést biztosító, sikeres és gyorsan növekvő vállalat
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest
Jelentkezem az állásra ›

Software engineer team lead (Budapest)
Software engineer team lead (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
középvezető
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Software engineer team lead
You will be responsible for empowering your team members through coaching, mentoring, feedbacks and career development. Our partner company is a leading Swiss software engineering firm specializing in the design, implementation and integration of large-scale business and security software solutions. Renowned Swiss and German customers from various industries and the public sector rely on their services and products. Their development center in Budapest is continuously growing so they are looking for new experts for our ongoing and brand new projects.
From the first day onward you can expect:
a dedicated people manager to support you
a dedicated project mentor to help your learning in
frequent feedback for guidance and further development
After 1 month you will:
participate in the in-house leadership program designed for this role
have our management handbook (toolkit for the role)
work with leadership mentors
After 3-6 months (depending on your progress) you will:
take over a group of software engineers
coach your team members to continuously develop themselves both personally and professionally
ensure that your team members thrive in a safe and positive environment with the right mindset and attitude
conduct regular career conversations and performance reviews with your team members
make sure that your team members receive constructive feedback frequently
keep up your team members' motivation
be a member of our leadership community
get support from a leadership mentor
participate in recruitment (optional)
play an active role in company-wide projects (optional)
For this challenging position, you ideally have:
in-depth knowledge of software development backend (Java is a plus) and/or front-end (Javascript, Angular, React) development
some experience in any kind of leadership role (technical/project/people management or mentoring)
solid understanding of the software development lifecycle and agile methodologies
ability to collaborate seamlessly and effectively with team members and potentially with the client
good communication skills in English (spoken and written)
a university degree (MSc/BSc)
Nice to have:
knowledge and/or practical experience as a coaching type of leader
experience in working in distributed teams
Continuous personal development and learning:
diverse, challenging tasks, a large variety of projects, both in terms of industry and technology
dedicated managerial support, helpful colleagues, supportive work culture
career path: further develop your skills in your areas of expertise, or try yourself out in other parallel fields: project or people management, learning new technologies
internal and external education, online and offline trainings (technical, soft skill, leadership), conferences
Great team spirit:
amazing social environment with friendly, smart and helpful colleagues
company sponsored events (project and company dinners, parties, long weekend in summer)
international atmosphere, collaboration with colleagues in Switzerland and Portugal
Flexible working hours
People care:
state-of-the-art workspace (small offices, height adjustable desks)
fresh fruit daily in the office, free coffee
breakout area with csocsó, xbox, fishpong
private health insurance from Medicover
on-site massage therapist
Place of employment:
Budapest

Python Software Engineer/Modelling Expert (Budapest)
Python Software Engineer/Modelling Expert (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - felsőfokú
Python Software Engineer/Modelling Expert
Tasks:
Software engineering of innovative MPC solutions for improved start-up and operation of power-plants and implementation of these optimal control solutions in real power-plants worldwide
Setup and verification of transient process models
Ongoing development and maintenance of software for solving of non-linear optimization problems in Python, C++ or in Modelica
Execution of projects for online performance optimization of power-plants
Customizing the SW as per project specific requirements
Integration, testing, documentation, review
Collaboration in international teams
Our Client is committed to making sustainable, reliable, and affordable energy a reality by pushing the boundaries of what is possible. They uphold a 150-year legacy of innovation that encourages our search for people who will support their focus on decarbonization, new technologies, and energy transformation.
Expert Level:
Degree in computer science, engineering, physics or (applied) mathematics (PhD is an advantage)
Python including Pytest, Numpy, Pandas
Git and Gitlab CI/CD.
Non-linear dynamic Optimization with direct approach (Collocation).
Business fluent English language (if you can speak in German it is a plus but it is not expected)
 Advanced Level:
Formulation and solution of dynamic optimization problems.
Solving performance and robustness issues with non-linear optimization problems.
Transient behavior of (power) plants.
Model based control technology.
Offer:
Competitive salary level (based on your professional background)
Other benefits: cafeteria, yearly bonus
Work in a friendly, modern environment
2 Home office per week
Flexible working hours – work-life balance provided
Training opportunities
Team building events, fruit days, health care programmes in the company
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest

angol - középfokú
Cloud Platform Engineer
Responsible for Platform operations, Platform support, Infrastructure deployment in Microsoft Azure environment.
Implement Container services with Platform (AKS)
Implement new platform functionalities to enhance platform capabilities
Work with Cloud Security team to implement security of platform including Firewall, Networking, NSG rules.
Azure Monitoring, Scaling, Availability, and performance/Utilization measurement
Coordinate for Backups, updates & maintenance for onPrem solutions
Our Client is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility.
4-6 years Strong Technical experience in supporting and implementing Azure DevOps CI/CD pipelines for Databricks, Azure ML, AKS etc
Strong experience with Azure Cloud infrastructure e.g deploying infrastructure, Networking, Security, Firewall etc.
Strong experience with Terraform/PowerShell/ARM scripting.
Strong Experience with Microsoft Azure Virtual Machine, Log Analytics and Express Route.
Stable company background and long-term working possibility
Full of challenges and high-level professional activities at an international company
Participation in international projects and commission to foreign countries
Career opportunities, continuous training program and language courses
Competitive salary and performance-related bonus
Cafeteria with optional elements

SAP Senior Consultant - Production Planning (Budapest)
SAP Senior Consultant - Production Planning (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
5+ év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - felsőfokú
SAP Senior Consultant - Production Planning
Tasks:
Comprehensive IT project management with a focus on SAP production logistic IT systems in cooperation with ZF IT and Business departments worldwide
Smaller customizing in SAP systems in logistic modules like SAP PP or MM are done by yourself
Create functional specifications, hand over to internal or externals project members and check if they are fullfilled
Create project plans, track project against them, manage vendors and suppliers in all project phases
Interaction at specialist and management level to control complex conversation and negotiation situations
Our client is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility. With its comprehensive technology portfolio, the company offers integrated solutions for established vehicle manufacturers, mobility providers and start-up companies in the fields of transportation and mobility.
Requirements:
IT degree or comparable
Minimum 5 years of experience in relevant SAP modules
Experience as project member or project manager
Familiar with waterfall or agile project management methodology
Excellent English communication and presentation skills to provides project leadership and direction to all stakeholders. 
Offers:
Stable company background and long-term working possibility
Full of challenges and high-level professional activities at an international company
Participation in international projects and commission to foreign countries
Career opportunities, continuous training program and language courses
Competitive salary and performance-related bonus 
Cafeteria with optional elements
Home office work
School start support
Location:
Budapest

Nagyvállalati környezet - Medior hardver fejlesztőmérnök - Áramköri ismeretek - Veszprém (Veszprém)
Nagyvállalati környezet - Medior hardver fejlesztőmérnök - Áramköri ismeretek - Veszprém (Veszprém)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
távmunka, home office
angol - középfokú
Nagyvállalati környezet - Medior hardver fejlesztőmérnök -
Áramköri ismeretek - Veszprém
/*Medior hardvermérnök - Áramkörtervezés - Középfokú angol*/
Ügyfelünk egy 30 éves cég, amely családi vállalkozásból nőtte ki magát, Németországban alapították, és ma vezető globális szereplő a piacon. A a szenzorgyártás, az automatizálás szakértője. 3600 dolgozója van világszerte. Magyarországon Budapesten és Veszprémben találhatók.
Feladatok:
Analóg és digitális áramkörök, kapcsolások tervezése, méretezése és tesztelése
Nyomtatott áramkörök fejlesztésének támogatása
Beágyazott szoftverek fejlesztése, tesztelése
Nemzetközi fejlesztő csapat tagjaként szoros együttműködés az elektronikai fejlesztés, a konstrukció, a minőségbiztosítás és a gyártástechnológia szakembereivel
A fejlesztendő termékek kvalifikációs tesztjeinek megtervezése, végrehajtása, a teszt eredmények kiértékelése
A kifejlesztett termékek dokumentációinak, mérési utasításainak elkészítése, gyártás támogatása
Munkavégzés helye
Veszprém + heti 1 nap HO
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Neked ajánlott állások
Neked ajánlott állások

HARDWARE MÉRNÖK - FEJLESZTÉS, GYÁRTÁSTÁMOGATÁS (Pályakezdők jelentkezését is várjuk!)
EasyHiring Services Kft. -

Thyssenkrupp -

Senior Java fejlesztő - Spring Boot - Nemzetközi projektek - Légi közlekedés! (Budapest)
Senior Java fejlesztő - Spring Boot - Nemzetközi projektek - Légi közlekedés! (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Középfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
távmunka, home office
angol - középfokú
Senior Java fejlesztő - Spring Boot - Nemzetközi projektek - Légi közlekedés!
/* Senior Java - Spring - Tárgyalóképes angol - Vonzó bér - Alkalmazotti, hibrid/
Partnerünk egy neves kereskedelmi és teherforgalommal foglalkozó légitársaság Európában. Az 1920-as első repülésük óta felfedezik a világot, a VR és az AR izgalmas lehetőségeit kutatják. Budapesti szoftverfejlesztő csapatukba keresik most legújabb tagjaikat! Az új fejlesztők a jelenlegi termékfejlesztési projektekbe kapcsolódnak be. Jelenleg 8 fős a csapat, év végéig 20 főre terveznek bővülni.
Te vagy az ideális jelölt, ha:
Erős Java tudással, több éves nagyvállalati tapasztalattal rendelkezel.
Könnyen elsajátítasz új programnyelveket, és képes vagy komplex problémákat megoldani.
Képes több összetett rendszert átlátni, összetett technológiákat használni, valamint a meglévő rendszereket az ügyfél igényeknek megfelelően megújítani.
Képes vagy algoritmikus gondolkodásra, erős rendszerszemlélettel rendelkezel.
A feladatok összetettsége:
A feladatok középpontjában a meglévő technológiákat új informatikai megoldásokhoz használó, áttörést jelentő innovációk állnak.
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest, 9. kerület + 3 HO, 2 iroda/hét

IT Infrastructure Support Engineer (Windows) (Budapest)
IT Infrastructure Support Engineer (Windows) (Budapest)
A hirdetés már lejárt!
Hays Hungary Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
IT Infrastructure Support Engineer (Windows)
Your new company
Our partner is a major supplier of quality electrical components to the European Automotive industry.
They provide tailor-made products and services for several car manufacturing companies. Their company runs two sites in Hungary, a factory in Mór and a distribution centre at the outskirts of Budapest.
Your new role
• Primarily support the Hungarian operations - warehouse and customer services (BILK) facility and the manufacturing (Mor) facilities
• Support the server and network environments – VM ware, Windows servers, SANs, switches, routers, etc.
• Support PC systems’ and peripheral devices (e.g. printers, etc) in a Microsoft Windows environment
• Install, configure and optimise Microsoft Windows operating systems
• Support running of Microsoft Office versions 2013, O365
• Support running of Web Based applications
• Handle client-side and server-side TCP/IP. (including DNS, WINS and DHCP)
• Handle virus protection activities
• Patch new connections via structured cabling
• Perform wireless access point/router and mobile device configuration
• Understand VPN network
• Train colleagues and subordinates where necessary
• Preparing necessary reports and manage suppliers as necessary
• Purchase, setup, install and/or maintain IT operation and IT related equipment and other office resources
• Follow the European IT policies, procedures and standards concerning hardware, software, security policies, software licences and backup control
• Ensure IT facilities are correctly and made available on time for all new starters
• Deliver IT induction for new starters (PC policy, email, office, etc)
What you'll need to succeed
• Higher level degree or technician qualifications in Information Technology
• Good experience of Windows Servers, IIS, Active Directory, Exchange Server, Windows Terminal Server
• Some knowledge of VMware virtual environments and VPN networking
• Good English knowledge
• Familiarity with multinational companies
• Valid driving licence
• Out of hours working may be required
What you'll get in return
• Attractive salary package - cafeteria, private pension fund, commuting allowance
What you need to do now
If you're interested in this role, click 'apply now' to forward an up-to-date copy of your CV, or call us now.
If this job isn't quite right for you but you are looking for a new position, please contact us for a confidential discussion on your career.

Data and AI Solution Architect (Budapest)
Data and AI Solution Architect (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Data and AI Solution Architect
Tasks:
Design and support implementation and operation of cloud Data Science, Data Analytics and Artificial Intelligence solutions in accordance with the strategically set technology stack
Understand and translate business requirements in appropriate system design for full -life-cycle development projects and software products in a cross-functional team of Analytics and Artificial Intelligence solutions
Establish Data and AI architecture and solution design related routines, develop and adhere to standards and guidelines in alignment with our Enterprise Architecture Management
Ensure usage of strategic systems and a sustainable incorporation of Data and AI Solution Design skills and knowledge within our Partner and actively advise internal customers on related questions
Engage in national/international data, tech & architecture communities and support the firm to stay up to date to market developments
Our Partner is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility. We are looking for Data and AI Solution Architect colleagues to be part of their team. 
Requirements:
Bachelor’s degree (Masters preferred) in Computer Sciences / Information Technology (or equivalent) with fundamental knowledge of Solution Design in data science, (big data) analytics and AI technologies, processes and procedure models
3+ years of experience in a Solution Design or Architectural role preferably in (Big Data) Analytics, cloud/software applications and other related disciplines
Good knowledge of Cloud solution designs associated data, analytics and ML frameworks/libraries and analytics tools and technology (Microsoft Azure Cloud, Databricks, MLflow, DevOps, CI/CD pipelines and automation etc.)
Passion for data, always striving to learn new things and at the same time applying your skills and new technology to bring value to our business partners
Highly motivated and open personality, outstanding ability to communicate, personal commitment, organizational skills, flexibility, creativity, teamwork
Experience working in agile teams, comfortable working with geographically distributed teams.
Excellent verbal and written English language skills
Offers:
Stable company background and long-term working possibility
Full of challenges and high-level professional activities at an international company
Participation in international projects and commission to foreign countries
Career opportunities, continuous training program and language courses
Competitive salary and performance-related bonus 
Cafeteria with optional elements
Home office work
School start support
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest

Python Developer for Engineering Expert
Tasks
Focus is the software technical implementation of requirements our business
partners in the engineering departments, mainly in Python programming language

processes

Operation, installation, configuration and incident handling in the environment of
engineering applications

application environment

Our fast-growing client is searching for a Senior Python Developer with deep experties to their newly set-up IT team.
Our Partner is a German family-owned automotive company, and they would like to represent themselves also in the Hungarian market.
Education
University degree preferably in business administration or comparable business
experience
Work experiences – time/seniority/ sector:
Experienced working in an international, virtual team

Linux and Windows knowledge

development are an advantage, but not a must

Master data specialist - German-speaking
On behalf of our multinational partner, we are looking for a <strong>German-speaking Master Data Specialist</strong>! Do not hesitate to apply today and join a great team!
Responsibilities:
Being involved in the transition of master data processes from European entities to Hungary 
Being responsible for master data processing and management (Accounts Payable/ Accounts Receivable) 
Providing master data accuracy, driving MD clean-up projects
Managing review and execute change requests from customers, vendors and colleagues
Supporting master data projects
Requirements:
College or University degree or equivalent experience, preferably in accounting, business or IT related fields
At least 2 years of experience in the MDM field
Very good SAP knowledge
Strong English and at least intermediate German language skills 
Self-starting attitude and ability to work independently 
Strong team-player
Ability to pay close attention to detail and prioritize the right things at the right time
What our client offers:
Cafeteria
Flexible working arrangements
Company events
Fitness & health offers
Modern co-working workplace
Workplace:
Budapest

angol - felsőfokú
.Net Developer
Our partner is an international software development company based in Switzerland, with offices in the Netherlands, UK and Hungary.
Their main focus is on complex custom application development for their corporate partners in FMCG and pharma sectors. Our partner provides extensive software development services for its partners both in procurement, logistics, R&D, HR and production.
The team of Budapest is continuously growing, currently they have about 25-30 employees. They would like to expand their team with an experienced .Net Developer in an independent role with interesting responsibilities. You can both be a part of the business related tasks, planning and software development, while also using your communication, language skills. If you are open to a truly diverse position, please read the job description below! 
About this position
Continuously consulting with the clients, planning the software architecture together from the beginning
Participating in the complete life cycle of custom software development activities from concept and design to implementation, testing (outsourced), roll out and support
Create and maintain efficient and clean code
Continuously focusing on best problem solving practices
Requirements
4+ years of relevant software development experience with Microsoft technology stack (C#, ASP.NET, MS SQL, MVC, Azure)
Fluent English knowledge because of the international team
Excellent communication skills and consultancy mindset (you will be actively keeping contact with the partners in this role)
Advantages
Knowledge of Azure Cloud technologies (ServiceBus, AzureSQL, Redis cache etc.)
Worked in MVC environment
Experience on the front end side (React)
Offer
Flexible working hours (core time between 9:00 to 15:00)
You can work 4 days per week from home - but if you choose to work in office environment, a well-equipped office with lot of opportunities is waiting for you in the 7th district of Budapest
Cafeteria, bonuses
Various international career opportunities
Trainings (MCP exams are supported)
Occasional traveling opportunities (to primarly Switzerland)
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest

VAT Specialist EMEA focus
On behalf of our multinational client, we are looking for a VAT Specialist! If you would like to take the next step in your career, read further and learn how!
Responsibilities:
Preparation of VAT/ ESL/Intrastat reconciliations
VAT Specialist EMEA focus
Take part in reconciliations for filing annual VAT returns
Support VAT account reconciliation for local legal entities
Supervise VAT receivables/ payables with tax authorities in the region
Provide support to business functions (GL, AP, AR, CS) in related questions
Participate in European VAT audits
Requirements:
Strong SAP and MS Office (Excel) skills
Proactive and problem-solving attitude
3 years of experience in the field of VAT in a multinational environment or BIG4 
What our client offers:
Competitive salary and benefits package
Flexible working methodology
Career development opportunities
Free language courses
Vibrant company culture/life

Full Stack Developer (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
távmunka, home office
angol - középfokú
angol - felsőfokú
Full Stack Developer
This role will contribute toward technical design and the tactical delivery of an extensible, robust, secure, and re-usable web framework foundation.
What does the role consist of?
Define, develop and continuously improve solutions (working closely with the technical lead) 
Assist in governing the team’s usage of tooling, code libraries/frameworks and DevSecOps capabilities
Work in collaboration with Digital IT’s Network, Operations and Security teams
Test automation (to assist in the execution of quality assurance practices)
Assist in the assessment and governance of third-party products and services to ensure they are aligned to the Firm’s technology standards
Who is our Partner?
Our Partner is one of the world’s foremost leadership and talent consultancies. The firm provides senior-level executive search, board search and advisory, CEO succession, family business advisory, as well as leadership assessment and development to the world’s most respected organizations.
We are looking for experienced Full Stack Developers with the capability to contribute towards the building and maintenance of best-in-class, cloud-native user-centric web solutions.
What will be the key skills?
Bachelor or Masters Degree in Computer or Information Sciences or similar field
2+ years of relevant experience in delivering complex IT solutions across a broad mix of technologies, platforms and languages (e.g. .NET full, .NET Core, ReactJS, Angular, Vue, NodeJS etc.)
Excellent English language knowledge
Experience in a Cloud-native environment
Full stack development experience (ideally .NET Core and ReactJS)
Extensive experience in modern Web app user interface implementation 
Familiarity with industry best practices in areas such as accessibility, multi-device and browser compatibilmegity etc.
Demonstrated ability to work independently within a matrixed environment
Personal qualities:
Effective communication skills (internal and external communication)
Ability to handle sensitive information confidentially
Ability to work well in a fast-paced, intellectually demanding and service-oriented environment
Strong interpersonal skills with the demonstrated ability to gain the confidence, respect and trust of team members, peers, and senior leaders
Sound judgment and strong problem-solving skills
Advantages:
Experience in development-in-test, building test automation, unit tests 
Experience with Microsoft Azure and AWS cloud environments 
Experience building and consuming with API and MicroService-based architectures
What our partner offers:
To support your career development, they provide you various learning opportunities
Competitive base salary + Cafeteria + Bonus
Modern and dynamic office environment
Opportunity to work from home most of the time
Private health insurance
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest

Legyünk együtt sikeresek!
Stabil háttérrel rendelkező gyártó Partnerünk részére keresünk jelöltet az alábbi pozícióba:
Szoftver validációs mérnök
Feladatok
Új gépek kockázatelemzésében való részvétel;
Egyedi építésű vagy COTS gyártógépek szoftverjellemzőinek (PLC vagy egyéb) a tervdokumentációból való megismerése;
Kritikus funkciók meghatározása szoftvertervezés alapján a vállalati elveknek megfelelően;
Szoftver érvényesítési protokollok írása, tesztmódszer meghatározása az egyes szoftverfunkciókhoz;
A protokollban meghatározott szoftverfunkciók ellenőrzése a gyártógépen;
Vizsgálati eredmények dokumentálása;
A meg nem felelési követelmények dokumentálása, a vizsgálatban és a megoldásban való részvétel;
Közös munkavégzés a projektben részt vevő többi projektcsapat taggal – belső és külső csapattagokkal;
Teljes érvényesítési dokumentáció elkészítése angol nyelven.
Elvárások
Felsőfokú végzettség (mérnök, IT, minőségügyi);
Releváns tapasztalat;
Aktív angol nyelvtudás;
Utazási hajlandóság 30 - 60 nap/év.
Amit kínálunk
Work-life balance;
Tiszta, igényes munkakörnyezet;
Cafeteria;
Havi bónusz;
Rendszeres szűrővizsgálatok;
Kedvezményes mobilcsomag.
Előnyök
PLC ismeret
Munkavégzés helye
Tatabánya

Security Management Specialist (Budapest)
Security Management Specialist (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Hays Hungary Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Security Management Specialist
YOUR TASKS 
· Pursue and review of requirements regarding structure and processes of Business Continuity Management (BCM), Emergency and Crisis Management ECM) in the group national and international
· Further development of Business Continuity, Emergency and Crisis Management in the group
· Support of measures for coping incidents and crisis
· Representing the chapter BCM/ECM towards internal customers
· Updating groupwide regulations regarding ECM and BCM considering relevant group policies and legal requirements
 QUALIFICATIONS 
· University/High school degree in Security Management / Informatics / Engineering / Economics / Cyber security / Project management or a comparable qualification
· High-level (C1 / C2) English language
· Information Security basics knowledge / experience
· Experience in Business Continuity Management and/or Emergency and Crisis Management especially in the setup ideally at larger enterprises
· Experience in international projects
· Teamwork, self-confidence and diplomatic skills
 ADDITIONAL INFORMATION 
· BCM / ECM certifications (CBCI, CECMI, ISO 22301, 27001, ...)
· German language
· CISM certification
· Project Management certificates (e.g. PMP, PRINCE2)
· Experience in agile methods (e.g. Kanban, Scrum)
What you need to do now
If you're interested in this role, click 'apply now' to forward an up-to-date copy of your CV, or call us now.
If this job isn't quite right for you but you are looking for a new position, please contact us for a confidential discussion on your career.

beosztott

Senior Business Analyst
Your new company
E-commerce start-up on a quest to develop a market leading e-commerce platform from ground zero
Your new role
 Gathering, validating, analysing and documenting business requirements
o Conducting meetings and presentations to share ideas and findings
o Modelling business processes and identifying opportunities for process improvements
o Identifying issues, risks and benefits of existing and proposed solutions and outlining business impacts
o Creating functional specifications for solu ons
o Estimating costs and identifying business savings
o Supporting business transition and helping to establish change
o Effectively communicating your insights and plans to cross-functional team members and management
o Gathering critical information from meetings with various stakeholders and producing useful reports
o Ensuring solutions meet business needs and requirements
o Prioritizing initiatives based on business needs and requirements
What you'll need to succeed
o A minimum of 5 years of experience in business analysis or a related field
o Exceptional analytical and conceptual thinking skills
o Advanced technical skills
o Excellent documentation skills
o Excellent planning, organizational, and time management skills
o A history of leading and supporting successful projects
o Fundamental analytical and conceptual thinking skills
o Competency in Microsoft applications including Word, Excel, PowerPoint and Outlook
o Experience with Agile Methodologies, Scrum, Kanban
o Experience working closely with Product Owner
o Experience with Miro, Figma and Visio is a plus
o Experience with UML 2.0, BPMN 2.0 is a plus
o Experience in eCommerce or Retail Commerce Domain is a plus
o Project Management / Assisstant skills is a plus
o Test Management, Manual Testing, UAT Testing experience is a plus
What you'll get in return
o Competitive Salary
o Annual bonus
o Flexible home office
What you need to do now
If you're interested in this role, click 'apply now' to forward an up-to-date copy of your CV, or call us now.
If this job isn't quite right for you but you are looking for a new position, please contact us for a confidential discussion on your career.

Cloud Data Engineer (Budapest)
Cloud Data Engineer (Budapest)
A hirdetés már lejárt!
Randstad Hungary Kft
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
távmunka, home office
angol - középfokú
Our prestigious German client operates as an unique electronic and software developer competence center, specialized in the field of electronic steering systems, they are one of the leading multinational companies in the automotive industry, whose main focus is to create and provide high-tech development solutions to its partners.
Cloud Data Engineer
Feladatok
Implement ETL and streaming processes to bring local production and other data to their Cloud Platform using Azure Functions, Azure Data Factory, machine learning and analytic services
Leverage the insights to their data using data analytics tools, image pattern recognition and other data processing functions
Working together in an international team with web application developers, data engineers and DevOps engineers
Követelmények
Education in Computer Science, Mathematics, Information Technology or Information Systems (bachelor, high school or comparable experience)
2+ years experience in one or more object-oriented languages (Javascript, Typescript, Python, Java, etc.)
Experience with git version control, CI/CD Pipelines with GitHub or Azure DevOps
Knowledge and experience about database design
Experience in cloud environments is a plus (Microsoft Azure, AWS, functions as a service, Docker, …)
Fluent English in spoken and written
Personality:
Think and act in the sense of the enterprise, analytical intellectual power
Make decisions in his/her field of activity, be an organizational talent
Efficient, independent and team oriented form of work
Good communication and problem solving skills
Integrated personality and organizational skills
Amit kínálunk
A modern office in the 11th district is waiting for you to support your creativity with fun community places, cafe rooms, an own cinema and a skybar
You can be part of a successful and growing company in the field of technology
They support you with flexible working hours and home office opportunity (60 % of the working time in many of their positions)
Competitive salary and wide range of other benefits (cafeteria & bonus) are provided to you
You can learn new languages in small groups, selecting from 5 languages
They organize leisure time activities (board games, sport activities)
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest
