Legyünk együtt sikeresek!
Elektronikai gyártó Partnerünk részére keresünk kollégát globál csapatba, a következő pozícióba:
IT projektmérnök
Feladatok
ÚJ MES és ERP projektek kivitelezése, a projekt sikeres végrehajtásának biztosítása;
A termelési területen használt ERP rendszer fejlesztése, a folyamatok és eljárások kidolgozása;
Új folyamatok és funkciók tervezése;
Új elektronikus gyártási projektek támogatása (MES és ERP szempontból), és tartja a kapcsolatot az ezért felelős IT csoporttal;
Szoftverkomponensek telepítése, konfigurálása és tesztelése;
A termelési rendszerekkel kapcsolatos problémák kezelése, gyökérok elemzés és hibaelhárítás nyomon követése és támogatása;
Alkalmazások megfelelő beállítása a gyártáshoz;
Az üzleti követelmények elemzése és tisztázása, illetve ezek dokumentálása.
Elvárások
Felsőfokú műszaki végzettség;
Projektmenedzsment ismeretek (főként IT projektekre vonatkozóan);
Aktív angol nyelvtudás (globál szintű a csapat);
Vállalati rendszerismeret (pl.:SAP).
Amit kínálunk
Hosszú távú karrierlehetőség stabil, nemzetközi vállalatnál;
Motiváló juttatási csomag (cafeteria, bónusz);
Home Office lehetőség;
Lakhatási és költözési támogatás;
Folyamatos képzések szervezése, előrelépési lehetőség vállalaton belül.
Előnyök
Elektronikai gyártásban szerzett tapasztalat;
Data Analysis/Data Management tapasztalat.

Székesfehérvár

Data Engineer (Magyarország)
Data Engineer (Magyarország)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Hays Hungary Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
Marketing, PR, média
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
távmunka, home office
angol - felsőfokú
Data Engineer
Your new company
Market leading automotive company is looking for an aspiring Data Engineer to work on international projects, on the field of advanced analytics and machine learning.
Your new role
Supporting data pipeline creation and their operation with defining the necessary data formats for recording, transfer and storage.
Your main focus is data quality, performance, scalability, and sustainability of the team’s solutions.
Supporting the design of conceptual and logical data models together with business experts.
Initiate open discussions, provide clear communication and answers with your data, deliver results according to project timelines and quality expectations, and create/present reports.
Continuous improvement of analytic workflows regarding performance based on user feedback.
Collaborate and share methodologies actively with your internal and external partners and business requirements in manufacturing and technology development.
What you'll need to succeed
BSc/MSc/PhD in computer science / (business) informatics, physics or comparable with min. 2 years of professional experience.
High level of proficiency implementing Azure data solutions, provisioning storage account, SQL Server Warehouse, designing relational and non-relational data stores.
Significant experience in designing and building ETL/ELT pipelines and resilient distributed systems.
Advanced Python is required, knowledge of C#/C++, LabView or any other high level programming language is plus.
Solid understanding of data warehousing concepts including the common schema architectures, dimensions, facts, aggregate facts.
Language: Hungarian and fluent English is required, German is plus.
What gives you further advantages:
Create/develop tools, frameworks or production line applications to automatize and deploy the results processed by ML activities.
Knowledge of ML models and concepts.
Knowledge of automation engines (Jenkins), containers (Docker).
Knowledge of major DevOps tools, version control (Bitbucket/GitHub).
What you'll get in return
Competitive salary
Cafeteria
Annual bonus
Felxible home office
What you need to do now
If you're interested in this role, click 'apply now' to forward an up-to-date copy of your CV, or call us now.
If this job isn't quite right for you but you are looking for a new position, please contact us for a confidential discussion on your career.

M365 Platform Management & Operations Expert (Budapest)
M365 Platform Management & Operations Expert (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Randstad Hungary Kft
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
távmunka, home office
angol - középfokú
Our client is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility. They allow vehicles to see, think and act. In the four technology domains of Vehicle Motion Control, Integrated Safety, Automated Driving, and Electric Mobility, the company offers comprehensive product and software solutions for established vehicle manufacturers and newly emerging transport and mobility service providers. Our client electrifies a wide range of vehicle types. With its products, the company contributes to reducing emissions, protecting the climate and enhancing safe mobility.
The new colleague will work in normal office hours (no shifts), and a very flexible HO policy is available with multiple options.
M365 Platform Management & Operations Expert
Feladatok
Responsibility for the M365 evergreen process
Ensuring and developing a professional M365 license management and optimize usage via relevant up- and downgrades
Automation and optimization of M365 operating processes (PowerShell, PowerPlatform)
Advice to M365 service owners regarding overarching processes and regulations
Processing of M365 support tickets
Engage in the continuous Merger and Acquisition (M&A) projects to bundle and act as single point of contact for M365 relevant activities
Követelmények
Experience in the operation of cloud solutions (preferably M365)
Process automation skills and KPI / dashboard creation is an advantage (PowerShell, PowerApps, PowerBI)
Customer focus and trouble-shooting experience
Ability to work in an international and virtual team environment as well as independent work
Good level of English language knowledge
Amit kínálunk
Stable company background and long-term working possibility
Full of challenges and high-level professional activities at an international company
Participation in international projects and commission to foreign countries
Career opportunities, continuous training program and language courses
Competitive salary and performance-related bonus 
Cafeteria with optional elements
Home office work
School start support

teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Légy részese egy olyan több mint 20 éves sikertörténetnek, amely Budapestről indult és vált nemzetközi szinten is egy meghatározó fejlesztési központtá. A budapesti kompetencia központjuk az elhivatott munkatársainak és az innovatív tudásnak köszönheti sikerét.Dinamikusan növekvő vállalatuknál megismerkedhetsz az autóipar legújabb kihívásaival és a világ vezető autógyártóival dolgozhatsz együtt.
Project quality specialist
Feladatok
A projekt elején felállítjuk a projekt minőségirányítási keretrendszerét, egyeztetjük a célokat a projekt vezetőivel, ellenőrzési pontokat határozunk meg, amelyek mentén aztán nyomon követjük a projektet.
A céges folyamatrendszert ráillesztjük a projektre, biztosítva az élhető és az előírásoknak is megfelelő működést. A feltárt hiányosságokat, kényelmetlenséget továbbítjuk a folyamatfejlesztés irányába, ezzel támogatva a céges folyamataink folyamatos fejlődését.
Erősítjük a quality fókuszt a napi munkában és a kiszállításoknál.
A projekt sajátosságai szerint testreszabjuk és működtetjük a mérőrendszert, amivel rendszeres, objektív adatszolgáltatást biztosítunk.
Analizáljuk a mutatókat, trendeket, feltárjuk a problémás területeket, ezáltal támogatva a projektet a kockázatok azonosításában, tennivalók meghatározásában.
Elkészítjük a szükséges riportokat és dokumentumokat, de vigyázunk arra, hogy ne papírgyárat hozzunk létre.
Assessmenteken, auditokon veszünk részt és képviseljuk a minőségirányítást az ügyfeleknél.
Követelmények
Részt vettél már szoftverfejlesztési projekt menedzsmentjében vagy annak támogatásában a karriered során.
Minőségügyi végzettséggel rendelkezel vagy a korábbi tapasztalataid során elsajátítottad ezt a fajta szemléletvégzettséged mellett.
Folyékonyan és magabiztosan beszélsz angolul.
A folyamatokat rendszerben látod, míg a rendszereket folyamatokra lebontva is tudod értelmezni.
Amit kínálunk
A XI. kerületben található modern irodaházukban kreatív környezetben dolgozhatsz, ahol sok színes közösségi tér, saját moziterem és egy skybar is vár
Rugalmas munkaidővel és home office lehetőséggel támogatnak (a legtöbb területen a havi munkaidő 60%-a)
Versenyképes fizetést és széleskörű juttatásokat (cafeteria és bónusz) biztosítanak számodra
Részese lehetsz egy sikeres, gyorsan növekvő technológiai vállalatnak
Új nyelveket tanulhatsz (5 nyelv közül választhatsz)
Szabadidős programokon kapcsolódhatsz ki (társasjátékok, sportolási lehetőség)

Technical Service Manager (Budapest)
Technical Service Manager (Budapest)
A hirdetés már lejárt!
Randstad Hungary Kft
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
5+ év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Our Partner is a Chinese car manufacturer company with a very classy place in the number of Fortune 500 companies. Besides car manufacturing, they also focus on research and development and  commercial activity of cars and commercial vehicles. They put great emphasis on application of alternative energy sources, intelligent vehicle technology and modernization of industrial methods. 
The company brought its CEE regional centre into Hungary and sales activity will be led from here. We are looking for a technical service manager for the Hungarian team, who will keep in touch with both the center and the distributors and develop a new system for warranty-related issues that will serve as a basis for the future.
Technical Service Manager
Tasks
Technical support for distributors
Establish local technical regulation,
COP test and CO2 Data collation.
Provide online repair technical consultation and technical solution
On-site diagnostic or technical support for complicated cases
Keeping technical training for distributors
Support the HQ with Quality with the information
collection and analyze the technical problems of vehicle models in order to imrove the product quality.
Participate in the copmlaint handling, investigation and resolution of major crisis 
Prepare technical Bulletin or Linguistic verification of the car before releasing in Territory market
People management of technical service team members
Maintains professional appearance.
Requirements
Mechanical degree
10 years of working experience,  min. 5 years of experience in automotive aftersales parts business management
Fluent English and Hungarian knowledge 
Very good communication and negotiation skills, able to effectively communicate with professionals in different cultures 
It is important to be proactive, to have initiatives and work well on your own 
Creative thinking in order to find efficient, customer oriented after sales/waranty solutions 
High level of flexibility 
Strong teamwork spirit 
Willingness to travel on a weekly basis
Offers
Competitive package (salary, bonus, cafeteria, company car with private allowance, company tools)
Contribution to a newly forming brand, forming processes and structures
Start-up atmosphere , innovative environment with constant developments, new technologies
Workplace
Budapest

Vulnerability Reporting Analyst (Budapest)
Vulnerability Reporting Analyst (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - felsőfokú
Vulnerability Reporting Analyst
Tasks:
Maintain oversight of all infrastructure hygiene, vulnerability reporting, and GEM reporting.
Work with vulnerability lifecycle managers, operations and application support teams, and the vulnerability data team to analyze requirements, design and develop specs and manage data which supplies information to all vulnerability threat reporting and analysis.
Create ad-hoc reports for additional management or audit related requests.
Work with partnering organizations to automate manual metrics and reporting.
Support the GEM Operations Lead with ad-hoc requests.
Our Client is one of the leading investment banks in the world, and for their growing professional team we are looking for a Vulnerability Reporting Analyst.
Requirements:
3+ years in vulnerability management or information security reporting functions
Strong communication skills.
Excellent attention to detail.
Familiarity with:
Vulnerability Assessment tools, e.g., Nessus, Qualys, etc.
OS Security, e.g., Unix, Linux, Windows, Cisco, etc.
Web application infrastructure, e.g., Application Servers, Web Servers, Databases
Web development and programming languages i.e., Python, Perl, Ruby, Java, and/or .Net
Business Intelligence tools
SQL scripting and advanced Excel skills
Strong work ethic and a proactive mindset with ability to think “outside of the box” to solve problems.
Experience solving complex data flow challenges.
Advanced knowledge of complex queries for data analysis.
Experience with at least one coding language (PowerShell, Python, C#, etc.).
Experience in automation and optimization of repetitive processes and reporting.
Education:
Bachelor’s degree/University degree or equivalent experience
Competitive compensation package with extensive benefits:
Private Medical Care Program and onsite medical rooms in our buildings
Pension Plan Contribution to Voluntary Pension Fund
Group Life Insurance
Flexible work arrangements
Continuous career progression opportunities across geographies and business line
An inclusive and friendly corporate culture with diverse networking opportunities
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest

Hálózati adminisztrátor
Leírás
Baranya megyei multinacionális partnerünkhöz keresünk az alábbi feladatok ellátására munkatársat:
Hálózati adminisztrátor
Feladatok
Hálózati infrastruktúra megtervezése, üzembe helyezése és a folyamatos, magas rendelkezésre állás biztosítása
Megbízható tanácsadás és támogatás belső ügyfelek részére a műszaki követelmények meghatározásában már a hálózati megoldások üzembe helyezésekor
Szerver infrastruktúrával kapcsolatos alapvető szolgáltatások és a globális biztonsági szabványok biztosítsa
Cloud infrastruktúraszolgáltatás (Azure/AWS) biztosítása, megvalósítása és üzemeltetése.
Stratégiai projektekben való részvétel (pl.: Cloud vagy on-prem infrastruktúra automatizálása, vagy új trendek, szoftver- és hardvertermékek értékelése a hálózati környezetben.)
Elvárások
Felsőfokú informatikai végzettség vagy vele egyenértékű szakmai tapasztalat
Több éves szakmai tapasztalat hálózat adminisztrációban és Linux disztribúcióban
LAN és WAN ismeret, valamint VLAN, ACLS, IPSEC és OSPF tapasztalat, ill. felhőalapú know-how (AWS, Azure)
Folyékony angol nyelvtudás szóban és írásban
Amit kínálunk
Országos szinten is kiemelt juttatási csomag
Stabil és kiszámítható nagyvállalati háttér
Fejlődési- és karrierlehetőség
SZÉP kártya
Tréningek és képzések
Munkába járás támogatása
Modern munkakörnyezet és home office lehetőség
Munkavégzés helye
Pécs

Multilingual SDA L1
Feladatok
Kapcsolattartás ügyfelekkel emailen, telefonon, chat rendszeren keresztül
Alapvető informatikai problémák kezelése
Beérkező panaszok (IT/service desk) kezelése idegennyelven
Tasks
Troubleshoot IT related issues and handle customer requests
Provide remote support through different channels such as telephone, email, or chat
Support top customers using your specific language skills
Érdekel az IT vagy Customer Support világa? Szívesen dolgoznál egy multikulturális közegben? Beszélsz angolul és németül vagy franciául? Ha igen, akkor van egy jó ajánlatunk számodra! Pályakezdőként, diploma és korábbi tapasztalat nélkül is jelentkezhetsz IT Support pozíciónkra.
Are you interested in IT or Customer Support? Would you like to work at a multicultural company? Do you speak English and German on French? If yes, then we have a opportunityl for you! You can be an expert or entrant/ fresh grad or even without degree or previous experience you can apply for the IT Support position.
Elvárások
Beszélj folyékonyan angolul és németül vagy franciául                         
Rendelkezz érettségivel, jó kommunikációs, problémamegoldó készséggel        
Customer service/ Order management/ IT tapasztalat nem elvárás, de előny               
Légy érdeklődő az IT Support/Customer service világa iránt
Expectations
Speak English on a communication level (for interviews, training, and internal communication)
Speak German or French on a business level (working/support language)
Have a high school diploma
Customer service or IT experience is not mandatory, but an advantage
Amit kínálunk
Multinacionális munkakörnyezet
Előrelépési, fejlődési lehetőségek
Home office
Interkulturális környezet
Cafeteria
Offer
Wide range of benefits, including a market-leading comprehensive private health care package
Self-development opportunities: our colleagues have many training possibilities for personal and professional growth
Both vertical and horizontal career options for those who like to challenge themselves and try out different areas and positions
You will be part of a global and diverse working environment with relaxation areas, terraces, and a friendly atmosphere
You can seize the day with us at our company events, hobby clubs, and sporting initiatives
An attractive compensation package

Project Manager - Global Identity & Access Management Operations Support (Magyarország)
Project Manager - Global Identity & Access Management Operations Support (Magyarország)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
középvezető
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Project Manager - Global Identity & Access Management Operations Support
Maintain a strong relationship with key business partners to foster a mutually beneficial partnership.
Represent GIAM Ops interests with technology partners when they want to make version updates and enhancements to GIAM Ops supported systems.
Provides general IS consulting services including interpretation and/or clarification of IS policy, procedures, standards and or concepts
Ensure strong program and project level governance, including monitoring and control efforts for the projects supported by GPO Ops, in compliance with Project Management Policy and Procedures.
Collaborates in the definition and implementation of IS standards to align procedures and practices in compliance with client's standards.
Works with the business to validate compliance with IS policies, practices, and procedures within the scope of a project or GIAM Ops processes.
Participates in the planning and implementation of IS administration for IT and business driven projects. 
Driving GIAM Ops project deliverables and managing the relationship between business/technical partner project teams and/or GIAM Ops Service Delivery
Support the GIAM Ops organization in meeting any ad hoc requirements from our partners
Tasks will include:
Evolve and maintain client and business Information Security Administration support relationships for multiple lines of business
Responsible for GIAM Ops owned project milestones and deliverables
Coordinate GIAM Ops engagement for client's level initiatives
Partner with IS governance programs and coordinating within GIAM Ops to implement policy changes
Understand risk and control levels for multi-functional areas for GIAM Ops supported systems/applications/tools and propose revisions where necessary. 
Readily adopt automation strategies wherever practical and cost efficient. Partner with peers within other service delivery centers and across Global Identity and Access Management to maximize operational efficiencies and effectiveness. 
Maintain a professional relationship with our business partners, colleagues and external customers through effective communications and diplomacy to guide and influence IS practices.
Provide project or program updates to GIAM Ops leadership and our business partners through multiple channels including verbal and written media
Proactively review GIAM Ops processes to address business impacts based on metrics review, business and GIAM Ops partner feedback or other sources to identify root causes and possible process improvements.
Proactively engage in any new system development or major enhancements that affect GIAM Ops services so GIAM Ops can provide the appropriate support and advisory.
Our Client is one of the leading investment banks in the world, and for their growing professional team we are looking for a Project Manager - Global Identity & Access Management (GIAM) Operations Support.
The Global Identity & Access Management (GIAM) is a global organization within Chief Information Security Office (CISO) with 700+ employees located across the globe. GIAM manages entitlement and provisioning of access for internal employees / contractors and increasingly for external clients who are using our client's applications. 
Bachelor's degree or higher with a concentration in Information Technology, Computer Science, Cyber Security or related field or equivalent relevant work experience. 
2 - 4 year’s work experience in Technical Project Management, Information Security, Computer Science or Cyber Security. 
Must be committed to the delivery of quality customer service.
Must be a self-starter with the ability to work in a fast-paced environment.
Deep knowledge GIAM Ops and/or GIAM Ops supported systems or applications 
General knowledge of Identity& Access Management practices on various platforms, applications, and systems.
Experience with problem and incident management processes for security and identity and access management incidents.
Extensive knowledge of global regulatory guidelines, industry standard security practices, client's corporate information security policies and compliance controls
Excellent problem-solving skills.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills required to negotiate internally and externally, often at a senior level. 
Advanced knowledge of Microsoft Office products (PowerPoint and Excel required) and GIAM Ops tools.
What our client offers:
Competitive compensation package with extensive benefits:
Private Medical Care Program and onsite medical rooms in our buildings
Pension Plan Contribution to Voluntary Pension Fund
Group Life Insurance
Flexible work arrangements
Continuous career progression opportunities across geographies and business line
An inclusive and friendly corporate culture with diverse networking opportunities

M365 Platform Management & Operations Expert
Tasks

Ensuring and developing a professional M365 license management and optimize usage via relevant up- and downgrades
Automation and optimization of M365 operating processes (PowerShell, PowerPlatform)
Advice to M365 service owners regarding overarching processes and regulations
Processing of M365 support tickets
Engage in the continuous Merger and Acquisition (M&A) projects to bundle and act as single point of contact for M365 relevant activities
Our client is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility. They allow vehicles to see, think and act. In the four technology domains of Vehicle Motion Control, Integrated Safety, Automated Driving, and Electric Mobility, the company offers comprehensive product and software solutions for established vehicle manufacturers and newly emerging transport and mobility service providers. Our client electrifies a wide range of vehicle types. With its products, the company contributes to reducing emissions, protecting the climate and enhancing safe mobility.
The new colleague will work in normal office hours (no shifts), and a very flexible HO policy is available with multiple options.
Requirements
Experience in the operation of cloud solutions (preferably M365)
Process automation skills and KPI / dashboard creation is an advantage (PowerShell, PowerApps, PowerBI)
Customer focus and trouble-shooting experience
Ability to work in an international and virtual team environment as well as independent work
Good level of English language knowledge
Offer
Stable company background and long-term working possibility
Full of challenges and high-level professional activities at an international company
Participation in international projects and commission to foreign countries
Career opportunities, continuous training program and language courses
Competitive salary and performance-related bonus 
Cafeteria with optional elements
Home office work
School start support
Workplace
Budapest

Our partner is one of the world's leading automotive technology companies, with headquarters located in Veszprém. The factory produces high-quality sensors for vehicle safety systems for all car manufacturers in the world.
We are looking for a Software Test Development Engineer for their growing team. 
Software Test Development Engineer
Feladatok
The following challenges await their new colleague:
Software test development of Advanced Driver Assistance System projects
Analyzing internal and customer requirements
Writing and executing test cases, evaluating test results
Support in analyzing root causes of detected failures
Creating test reports, resolving test environment related issues
Követelmények
The requirements you should fulfill:
Completed bachelor's or master’s degree in a field of engineering or computer science
Experience in C and/or Python programming
Good problem solving skills, practical thinking, engineering mindset

Senior Master Data Specialist - Slovak-speaking
On behalf of our multinational partner, we are looking for a Senior Master Data Specialist - Slovak-speaking.The Specialist is responsible for accurate recording of customer, vendor, general ledger, cost & profit center, material, pricing, rebate and contract information in SAP database. Also required to provide quality control over the elements and to provide guidance to the customers and business partners according to their needs. The position has an impact on several corporate functions and plays a key role especially in ensuring accurate information is provided for customer invoicing.
Responsibilities:
Set up/maintain/validate master data with complete account information
Active engagement with data validations and cleansing
Ensure that Idocs are processed in time and daily, weekly price-check are performed properly 
Act as liaison between Customer Invoicing Team and customers
Perform SOX reconciliations, prepare any ad-hoc reports, update SOPs when assigned
Contribute to operational improvement initiatives and projects when assigned
Requirements:
University or college degree in Finance & Accounting, Economics, Business Administration, Information Technology, or related field
At least 3 years experience in a service driven, customer oriented international environment focused on Master Data activities
SAP SD/FI knowledge
Excel skills (pivot tables, basic function)
Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English and Slovak
Excellent communication, interpersonal and analytical skills 
What our client offers:
Multinational background
Stability
Development opportunities
Work-life balance
Workplace:
Budapest

Let's be successful TOGETHER!
We are a headhunting company and working closely with manufacturing companies in Hungary.
One of our Partner, a strong and growing manufacturing company is looking for an expert in PowerBI.
Ir you have experience in the below mentioned tasks, please contact us.
The name of the position is:
Power BI developer
Feladatok
Use Power BI to create reports and dashboards that give decision makers quick access to the data they need;
Gather requirements from key stakeholders and recommend solutions;
Perform itemization, analysis, and documentation of existing data sources used by, and available to, the department;
Document the source, content, connection methods, and description of business value of data sources;
Document business data use cases and identify data quality needs;
Create a global data model using Power BI Dataflows and shared datasets;
Document, design, and code business logic for data models;
Combine data sets from multiple systems to create a global view of data;
Coordinate and conduct meetings such as: user interviews of business process reviews; gathering of data use case requirements; various status reports;
Develop strategy for version control and security of report.
Elvárások
College or University degree;
Active English knowledge as you will be using English on a daily level;
Experience in Business Intelligence Reporting, Software Development or Database Administration;
Experience using Power BI to solve business problems;
Proficiency with SQL.
Amit kínálunk
Motivating salary, cafeteria, bonus, extras (e.g. if you need to relocate, they can help you in that)
Interesting tasks with responsibility in the position
Trainings and development in this position
Előnyök
SAP experience.

Győr

Junior Golang Developer
Our client is a global software engineering and IT outsourcing services supplier, looking for a Junior Golang Developer. You’ll be part of a team of professionals who are ready to find the best tailor-made IT solutions for their multinational clients in various industries and solve complex problems. You’ll create high-quality software products that move digital marketing business forward. Our client believes in agile methods, quick hypothesis testing, and shining eyes. They need you, a Golang developer, to help them make all of their plans come to fruition!
Pozíció leírása / Job description
Together with the mentor, a professional development plan will be developed specifically for you;
You will hone your skills in developing web applications and using modern frameworks;
Learn the intricacies of working in a team of responsive and professional colleagues;
You will improve your knowledge of English at an incredible pace;
You will have a chance to test your skills in a real project.
Elvárások / Requirements
Solid knowledge / strong interest in Golang and understanding of the concurrency model of the language;
Excellent knowledge of the HTTP protocol;
Knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript at a basic level and the pursuit of excellence;
Knowledge of SQL, experience with one of the relational databases;
Git skills;
Fluent English
Will be plus:
Knowledge of Vue, React, Angular;
Experience with NoSQL;
Experience with Docker.
Amit kínálunk / Offer
Stable long-term work environment
Competitive salary with a flexible system of revisions
Benefits and social packages
Comfortable A+ office in Budapest 
Every necessary tool and device in the office will be provided to comfortably perform all project tasks: computers, meeting rooms, spacious modern kitchens with professional coffee machines, comfortable recreation areas with game consoles, board games, and a selection of literature for every taste
Paid English courses and conversation clubs
Opportunities for professional and personal growth
Mentoring program, internal and external professional training programs
Support and care from our partner's friendly team
Munkavégzés helye
Magyarország

Sharepoint Specialist
As an internationally positioned IT team, we support the Client's product development by providing applications and solutions for mechanical and software development and for the management of development data. In this processes, we count more than 6,000 users among our internal customers.
We operate in a very heterogeneous environment of applications, such as CATIA Mechanical Design, MS Project Server, JIRA, GIT Software Management, Doors NG Requirements Management, and our PLM system CIM Database.
To strengthen our team we are looking for a qualified and motivated IT specialist at our location in Budapest.
We offer an exciting work environment in a globally operating enterprise with many various opportunities for your own personal and professional growth.
Tasks
Detailing the solution design in close cooperation with our solution architects
Sharepoint development of add-on and Nintex-workflows according to the requirements of our business partners
Business Support in creating Sharepoint project rooms or communities according to the company's best practices
Evaluation and integration of new tools into the SharePoint collaboration tool environment 
User support, incident handling, and standard service fulfillment for the tool landscape 
Testing and documentation
Service owner for one or more collaboration applications possible
Requirements
Deep knowledge of MS-Sharepoint, at least 3 years of experience
Experience in creating Nintext workflows
General IT infrastructure knowledge
Interface and REST-API knowledge
Scripting Language Knowledge such as PowerShell, JavaScript, Visual Basic
Experience in dealing with web technologies
Good English skills (spoken and written)
Experienced working in an international, virtual team
Fluency in English
​Offers
Professional development opportunities
Competitive salary
Dynamic atmosphere
Remote working

C# Developer
Leírás
Megbízó partnerünk számára keresünk munkatársat, Medior / Senior C# Developer pozícióba szegedi lokációval. Partnerünk Európa egyik legnagyobb mérnöki és technológiai csoportja, Magyarország vezető informatikai cége.
C# Developer
Feladatok
Mérnöki rendszer projektgenerátor asztali eszközének és a hozzá tartozó API fejlesztése Windows platformon,
Az alkalmazás új szolgáltatásainak tervezése, fejlesztése és egységtesztelése C#, .NET Framework használatával,
A fejlesztőcsapat támogatása műszaki döntésekben, a terméktulajdonos támogatása,
Részvétel a kódellenőrzésben és a funkciók érvényesítési folyamatában,
Tesztautomatizálási keretrendszer fejlesztésének támogatása,
Új funkciók tervezésének támogatása,
Agilis scrum csapattal szoros együttműködés,
Kapcsolattartás fejlesztőkkel, tesztelőkkell és ügyfelekkel.
Elvárások
Szoftverfejlesztő végzettség,
Legalább 4 éves C# programozásban szerzett jártasság,
Mentorálásban szerzett tapasztalat,
Szoftvertervezési gyakorlat, tervezési minták ismerete,
Kommunikációképes angol nyelvismeret,
Proaktív hozzáállás,
Agilis (scrum) tudás,
Nyitottság az SW fejlesztési technológiák megismerésére,
Csapatszellem, tolerancia,
Jó kommunikációs és problémamegoldó készség.
Előnyök:
Német tudás,
Visual Studio IDE-ben szerzett tapasztalat,
Tapasztalat az Azure DevOps Server és Git verziókezelés terén,
WPF fejlesztésben szerzett tapasztalat,
Agile, Scrum területén szerzett tapasztalat,
Visual Studio bővítmények fejlesztésében szerzett tapasztalat,
Nemzetközi projektekben részvétel.
Amit kínálunk
Vonzó kompenzációs csomag,
Magán egészségbiztosítás a Medicovernél,

Lead Developer IoT Cloud
Your Tasks will be:
Responsibility for the architecture and interface design, requirements analysis and subsequent implementation for an end-to-end IoT cloud
Responsibility for conceptual tasks in backend development with high demands on data security and data protection.
Proactive source of ideas for new technologies, systems, processes and optimizations
Analysis, conception, implementation and testing of new customer-specific applications and modules.
Support for the requirements survey, presentation of the results to the customer and technical and technological advice.
Coaching and technical management of 10 developers in the team
The applications that you are responsible for implementing are based on Java, JavaScript, Python and Go. Other programming languages can also be integrated. The deployment infrastructure is in the cloud.
Our Partner is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility. We are looking for a Lead developer to be part of their team. 
Requirements:
Successfully completed studies in the field of (business) computer science, business (engineering) or a comparable subject
Very experienced in developing IT architectures
Several years of professional experience in the field of software development / full stack, cloud, microservices and knowledge of infrastructure and operations
Systematic application of methods for requirements analysis and agile software development (Scrum, Kanban, UX) as well as systematic application of standards in IT service management (IT-PEP, ITIL, DevOps)
Technology stack: extensive knowledge of Java and JavaScript, Docker, MS Azure and databases including graph databases
Fluency in written and spoken German and English
Offer
Stable company background and long-term working possibility
Full of challenges and high-level professional activities at an international company
Participation in international projects and commission to foreign countries
Career opportunities, continuous training program and language courses
Competitive salary and performance-related bonus
Cafeteria with optional elements
Home office work
School start support

Hays Hungary Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
Pénzügy, számvitel
Adminisztráció, asszisztencia
Logisztika, beszerzés
IT, telekommunikáció
Ügyfélszolgálat, call center
pályakezdő /tapasztalat nélkül
beosztott

teljes munkaidő
Pályakezdő pozíciók nemzetközi környezetben
Jól beszélsz idegen nyelveket és szeretnéd elindítani karrieredet egy nemzetközi cég munkatársaként?
Nincs még sok munkatapasztalatod, de lelkes vagy és szeretnél dolgozni?
Ha a válaszod ezekre a kérdésekre igen, akkor ez a lehetőség neked szól!
Többféle pozícióba is keresünk új munkatársakat mindenféle nyelvtudással!
A pozíciók nagy része a következő területeken belül mozog:
Pénzügy
Ügyfél-kapcsolattartás/ támogatás
Beszerzés
Junior IT
Adatkezelés / Adminisztráció
A sikeres pályázáshoz a következőkre van szükség:
Folyékony angol nyelvtudás és német nyelvtudás
Felsőfokú végzettség
Tanulni vágyó, nyitott, rugalmas személyiség
Amit mi cserébe kínálunk:
Versenyképes fizetés és juttatási csomag
Szakmai fejlődési lehetőség
Modern, nemzetközi környezet
Hosszú távú munkalehetőség
Stabil háttérrel rendelkező munkáltató
Ha érdeklődsz a lehetőségek iránt, ne habozz, jelentkezz angol nyelvű önéletrajzod feltöltésével!

French Service Desk Analyst
Amerikai multinacionális partnercégünkhöz új, francia nyelvű Service Desk Analyst pozícióba keresünk munkatársat. A technológiai cég informatikai szolgáltatásokat, köztük digitális, technológiai, tanácsadási és üzemeltetésii szolgáltatásokat nyújt, Budapest szívében.
A fő feladataid lesznek:
A kliensek IT problémáinak megoldása, a vevőkkel elsődleges kapcsolattartás (1. szintű IT support)
Végfelhasználói hívások és webes lekérdezések kezelése, ticket rendszerben, telefonon, e-mailben
Precíz dokumentálás és adminisztrálás
A felhasználók folyamatos informálása
Amit a cég tud nyújtani számodra:
Versenyképes fizetés
Cafeteria juttatás, All You Can Move fitnesskártya, egészségügyi biztosítás
Folyamatos fejlődési lehetőség, kurzusok, tréningek, nyelvórák
Csapatépítő programok
Home Office lehetőség
Ami szükséges a pozíció betöltéséhez:
magabiztosan kommunikálsz szóban és írásban egyaránt franciául és angolul is
van tapasztalatod ügyfélszolgálati területen, lehetőleg IT Help Desk részlegen, vagy multinacionális cégnél
kiváló kommunikációs készséggel rendelkezel írásban
jó a problémamegoldó készséged, tudsz önállóan dolgozni
előny, ha van tapasztalatod ERP rendszerben, lehetőleg SAP-ban vagy Oracle-ban

Logistics Network Solutions Analyst (Budapest)
Logistics Network Solutions Analyst (Budapest)
A hirdetés már lejárt!
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
Logisztika, beszerzés
IT, telekommunikáció
5+ év tapasztalat
középvezető
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - felsőfokú
Logistics Network Solutions Analyst
Tasks
Deliver supply chain design projects including logistics network optimization, inventory optimization, production capacity planning and sustainability
Project lead for supply chain network design optimization projects supporting all company divisions
Work with business partners to identify opportunities to leverage software or tools that improve process efficiency
Lead development of data driven models and analytics to drive business results (quality, cost, delivery) for various supply chain problems
Act as the technical lead and SME, providing direction on complex modelling scenarios
Develop dashboards and reporting project results using Power BI / Tableau
Develop project implementation plan and milestones, address any issues
Identify project value and track actual cost saving after deployment
Drive strategic improvement of service capabilities leveraging Llamasoft (Coupa)
SME of logistics tools including supply chain network design optimization tools / llama.ai, Data Guru, SCGX
Develop capabilities of logistics tools to provide reporting and data intelligence that enables logistics optimization projects
Deploy best practice of network solutions, and improve capabilities of service offering
Position is dynamic to potentially perform additional responsibilities as assigned within GLO organization
Our partner is the world leader in specialty glass and ceramics. They create and make keystone components that enable high-technology systems for consumer electronics, mobile, emissions control, telecommunications, and life sciences. They succeed through their sustained investment in R&D, more than 150 years of materials science and process engineering knowledge, and a distinctive, collaborative culture. They work closely with their customers to solve complex problems that others can’t, or won’t solve. 
Expectations
Bachelor's degree in Supply Chain, Business, Industrial Engineering
Min. 5 years of logistics or supply chain experience at regional/ global level
Experience in Project management leading cross functional teams at global or regional level
Experience in leading supply chain network design projects, including logistics network, inventory, and capacity planning
Experience in using supply chain network design tools eg. llama.ai suite of tools
High proficiency with Excel, PowerPoint, Power BI (Six Sigma, lean desired)
Result-oriented with good interpersonal, analytical and presentation skills
Offer
Modern office environment in the 11th district
Cafeteria (SZÉP card, Cultural service, Crèche)
Yearly bonus: 5% of annual base salary based on corporate and business measures
Hybrid workplace
Life- and accident insurance for every colleagues (for all employees, not linked to a probationary period)
Learning Center: professional online platform for self-development
Regular and varied soft-skill trainings
Free weekend parking in the office underground parking lot
Excel Club
Language courses upon needs
Functional teams to join for example charity team, employee satisfaction team, etc.
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest

German Master Data Specialist
Our stable and prestigious multinational partner is currently building up a new operation and  looking for a master data specialist to join their them for an exciting transition project in Budapest. 
About the job 
As a German speaking specialist you will responsible for keeping contact with the streams abroad and maintain MDM attributes. Ensure data quality, enrichment and integrity, resolve any queries and issues. Assist integration of the data for customers and vendors and assure that procedures are compliant.
What's in it for you
You can join a new operation and grow with the new team
Vast range of career opportunities
Competitive salary and benefit package
Home office opportunity
Employee-focused culture
The ideal candidate 
Has at least 2 years experience in a multinational/SSC environment from a similar field (preferably from Accounting or Master Data)
Has at least an intermediate English and German language knowledge
Customer focused mindset
Precise and can multitask well
Has logical thinking and good organizational skills
What you need to do now 
If you're interested in this role, click 'apply now' to forward an up-to-date copy of your CV.
If this job isn't quite right for you but you are looking for a new position, please contact us for a confidential discussion on your career.

Medior firmware fejlesztőmérnök -
Áramköri ismeretek - C/C++ - Aktív angol tudás
/*Nemzetközi fejlesztő csapat - Medior firmware fejlesztőmérnök - Szakmai tréningek - Veszprém*/
Ügyfelünk egy 30 éves cég, amely családi vállalkozásból nőtte ki magát, Németországban alapították, és ma vezető globális szereplő a piacon. A a szenzorgyártás, az automatizálás szakértője. 3600 dolgozója van világszerte. Magyarországon Budapesten és Veszprémben találhatók.
Feladatok:
Elmozdulás-mérő szenzorok fejlesztési projektjeiben való részvétel
Beágyazott szoftverek fejlesztése C vagy C++ nyelven
Projekthez kapcsolódó mérések elvégzése dokumentálása
Nemzetközi fejlesztő csapat tagjaként együttműködés a konstrukció, a minőségbiztosítás és a gyártástechnológia szakembereivel
A kifejlesztett termékek dokumentációinak, mérési utasításainak elkészítése
Munkavégzés helye
Veszprém + HO

Trenkwalder Kft.

IT, telekommunikáció
Gyártás, műszaki terület
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Funkcionális tesztmérnök
Leírás
Győri Partnerünk számára keresünk munkatársat Funkcionális tesztmérnök pozícióra.
Funkcionális tesztmérnök
Feladatok
Gyártósori funkcionális teszt berendezések mérőköreinek, elektromos, műszeres és szoftveres tervezése
Használatban lévő teszt berendezések üzemeltetetése, optimalizálása, hatékonyságuk folyamatos fejlesztése
Tesztelési rutinok programozása és bevezetése a vevői specifikációk alapján
Műszaki dokumentációk elkészítése, felhasználók oktatása
Együttműködés külföldi- és belföldi kollégákkal, beszállítókkal
Elvárások
Villamosmérnöki vagy Informatikus-mérnöki (elektronikai háttérrel) végzettség
Objektum orientált programozásban szerzett tapasztalat
Áramköri/kapcsolási rajzok értelmezése, villamos hálózatok működésének készségszintű ismerete
Pneumatikus, elektro-pneumatikus gépelemek működésének ismerete
Analitikus gondolkodásmód, rendszerszemlélet, jó problémamegoldó képesség
Kommunikációs szintű angol nyelvtudás
Szakmai tapasztalat elektronikai gyártó környezetben előny
Gyártóeszközök üzemeltetésében, javításában szerzett tapasztalat előny
C# és Visual Basic .NET programozási nyelv felhasználói szintű ismerete előny
Technológiai projekt menedzsment
Amit kínálunk
Fiatalos, dinamikus csapat, jó csapatmunka
Saját elképzelések megvalósítása
Szakmai- és személyes fejlődési lehetőség
Versenyképes fizetés, teljesítménytől függő prémium
Munkavégzés helye
Győr

Service Operations Engineer
Tasks:
Owning, leading and driving issues and representing the company during technical conference calls
Handling technically complex incidents and changes
Being responsible for cooperating with internal and external stakeholders 
Having the opportunity to learn from 3rd line network engineers throughout troubleshooting sessions
Being exposed to a wide array of internetworking technologies through supporting complex network solutions
Our partner is a global service provider, delivering communication services and solutions to business customers with multi-site organisations.
Requirements:
In-depth understanding of LAN/WAN technologies (think CCNA-level knowledge, the certificate is not needed)
Experience in technical support
Familiarity with the following products is an advantage: Juniper, Adva, Avaya, Ipanema, Meraki
English on conversational level
​Offers:
Excellent opportunity to work for a strong, multinational company
Freedom due to shifts
Attractive salary and compensation package
Internationally oriented working environment in a strongly expanding company
Training and development possibilities

Vulnerability Reporting Analyst (Budapest)
Vulnerability Reporting Analyst (Budapest)
A hirdetés már lejárt!
Randstad Hungary Kft
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Középfokú végzettség
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Our Client is one of the leading investment banks in the world, and for their growing professional team we are looking for a Vulnerability Reporting Analyst.
Vulnerability Reporting Analyst
Feladatok
Maintain oversight of all infrastructure hygiene, vulnerability reporting, and GEM reporting.
Work with vulnerability lifecycle managers, operations and application support teams, and the vulnerability data team to analyze requirements, design and develop specs and manage data which supplies information to all vulnerability threat reporting and analysis.
Create ad-hoc reports for additional management or audit related requests.
Work with partnering organizations to automate manual metrics and reporting.
Support the GEM Operations Lead with ad-hoc requests.
Követelmények
3+ years in vulnerability management or information security reporting functions
Strong communication skills.
Excellent attention to detail.
Familiarity with:
Vulnerability Assessment tools, e.g., Nessus, Qualys, etc.
OS Security, e.g., Unix, Linux, Windows, Cisco, etc.
Web application infrastructure, e.g., Application Servers, Web Servers, Databases
Web development and programming languages i.e., Python, Perl, Ruby, Java, and/or .Net
Business Intelligence tools
SQL scripting and advanced Excel skills
Strong work ethic and a proactive mindset with ability to think “outside of the box” to solve problems.
Experience solving complex data flow challenges.
Advanced knowledge of complex queries for data analysis.
Experience with at least one coding language (PowerShell, Python, C#, etc.).
Experience in automation and optimization of repetitive processes and reporting.
Education:
Bachelor’s degree/University degree or equivalent experience
Amit kínálunk
Competitive compensation package with extensive benefits:
Private Medical Care Program and onsite medical rooms in our buildings
Pension Plan Contribution to Voluntary Pension Fund
Group Life Insurance
Flexible work arrangements
Continuous career progression opportunities across geographies and business line
An inclusive and friendly corporate culture with diverse networking opportunities
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest

Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Hays Hungary Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Középfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
ERP Specialist
ERP Specialist
 Our partner, specialized in manufacturing agricultural components, is looking for an ERP Specialist.
 As an ERP Specialist you will be responsible for implementing and integration the new ERP software.
You will be responsible for:
Establishing ERP needs via business process analysis and consultation.
Analyzing existing infrastructure and performing IT system enhancements.
Performing diagnostic tests and resolving issues to optimize performance.
Providing technical support and training ERP end-users.
What you will need to succeed?
 At least 2 - 5 years experience as an ERP specialist in a related industry.
In-depth knowledge of ERP development tools, coding languages, and business processes.
Great organizational and time management skills.
Good interpersonal, collaboration, and communication abilities.
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
Good English knowledge, both verbal and written.

DevOps Manager (Budapest)
DevOps Manager (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
Gyártás, műszaki terület
IT, telekommunikáció
5+ év tapasztalat
beosztott
Középfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
DevOps Manager
As an operative leader you will be responsible for:
Creating an annual strategy for the department and approving it with management.
Defining goals for the implementation of the strategy, elaborating a quarterly action plan, implementing, communicating, and reporting on them.
Develop, implement and continuously report action plans to the management to achieve the resulting metrics and KPIs.
Establishment of the operational framework and processes related to the department (task management, used tools, priorities).
Growing and leading a team of 8 Systems / DevOps Engineers.
Develop recruitment, onboarding, training, and mentor system for positions, related to the department in line with the company expectations and systems.
Continuous monitoring and measurement of the work of colleagues under your responsibility, ensuring their professional and personal development, giving regular feedback.
Liaison with external partners (e.g. hosting), escalation, preparation of draft contracts.
As a technical leader you will be responsible for:
As the last escalation point of the department, you will be responsible for the
validation, analysis, and development of the escalated cases.
Active role in the elimination of critical errors.
Ensure that the system meets current security requirements.
Act as a project manager and product owner.
Ensuring communication with stakeholders, follow-up case analyzes.
Effective communication with key clients. 
Our client - provides innovative Cloud-based Contact Center solutions that empower companies to provide the best customer experience - is looking for Senior React Developers. With their software, contact centers can handle a full spectrum of incoming and outgoing communications – through Phone, Email, SMS, Chat, and Social Media.
They are looking for you, if :
You have strong experience in people management for at least 5 years, e.g. building and leading an operation/devops team (min. 3 people).
You have experience developing new processes and managing the team’s work (e.g. feedback, coaching, cost planning).
You have project management or product owner experience in infrastructure-related development.
You have SYS / OPS / DEVOPS past, especially in the Linux environments.
Experienced with diversified technologies in private or public cloud solutions (AWS, GCP, Azure, etc.).
You have worked with wide experience in analyzing and implementing the infrastructure as a code (Ansible, Puppet, Docker) environment.
Experience in telecommunication systems is an advantage.
You have an excellent analytical and systems approach, and outstanding problem-solving ability.
You are continuously improving yourself, and have a helpful attitude.
Conversational level English (both written and spoken)
Fluent/Native Hungarian 
Our client commits to investing in your personal growth in the long run (attractive salary package, benefits, and career opportunities). 
The opportunity to work at a financially stable, growing company with a strong international presence and market positions in Europe, America, and East Asia. 
A healthy work-life balance with flexible work options. 
A company with regular team building, sports events, charity programs, and fun events.
Mentorship and training opportunities from the start. We create your career path together to help you reach your maximum potential. 
Internal training sessions, school programs, language courses, as well as the chance to travel the world to meet end-users and clients at conferences and meetings.
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest

Senior Red Team Operations & Penetration Testing Analyst (Budapest)
Senior Red Team Operations & Penetration Testing Analyst (Budapest)
A hirdetés már lejárt!
EasyHiring Services Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Senior Red Team Operations & Penetration Testing
This dynamic role requires broad understanding of red team operations and penetration testing principles to support Aegon’s Security program.
As a part of the Red Team team within the global SOC, you will be a part of the Security Operations team responsible for unannounced red team operations and managing penetration tests. The Red Team conducts advanced adversary emulation operations to challenge assumptions and emulate cyber and criminal threat actors targeting or attacking the business.
As a Red Team member, you will participate in the design and execution of campaign-based security operations for Aegon, spanning a varying array of targets. Successful team members must be capable of evaluating environments, applications, systems or processes to discover weaknesses, and subsequently leverage those discoveries into actionable real-world attack strategies.
To succeed in this role the candidate will possess breadth and depth of knowledge in security of operating systems, networking and protocols, firewalls, databases and middleware applications, forensics, scripting and programing. Red team members are expected to continuously improve their
tradecraft through research, to add breadth and depth to their knowledge.
Aegon Global Technology Services (GTS) provides IT infrastructure and application support services to the Aegon businesses. GTS is responsible for the provision, support and ongoing maintenance of IT operating platforms, applications and services. There is also a strong connection with external providers necessitating vendor and service provider management. GTS is responsible for driving the technology strategy and providing IT infrastructure solutions that are in alignment with business objectives and the GTS technology strategy.
What You Will Do: 
Find new and creative ways to break technology through either Red Team or Purple Team operations
Plan, scope, and implement large scale covert operations that have sophisticated goals and significant impact
Develop new adversary tools, techniques, or methodologies
Threat Hunting opportunities to partner with the teams Threat Hunters, using our special adversarial talents to discover and eradicate threats
Engagement in all phases of Red Team security operations
Work within the Red Team to perform physical exploitation, network exploitation and social engineering assessments against authorized targets
Perform network reconnaissance and open source intelligence gathering
Configure and safely utilize attack tools, tactics, and procedures against authorized targets
Develop scripts, tools, or methodologies to enhance red teaming capabilities
Effectively communicate findings and strategy to client stakeholders including technical staff, executive leadership, and legal counsel
Provide risk-appropriate and pragmatic recommendations to correct identified flaws, vulnerabilities and misconfigurations
Lead projects in mid to high level complexity
Mentor other more junior members of the team
Requirements
Do No Harm approach: operational objectives cannot come at the expense of others
Growth Mindset. Excited for opportunities to solve new problems every day
Helpful demeanor. We are trusted adversaries and that trust needs to remain strong
Customization of Adversarial Tools: Cobalt Strike BOFs, Mythic Agent profiles, and adding new exploits to MSF are examples
Defender experience and knowledge. Utilizing Splunk and finding risks
Web application penetration testing assessments
Email, phone, or physical social-engineering assessments
Developing, extending, or modifying exploits, shell code or exploit tools
Network penetration testing and manipulation of network infrastructure
Relevant, recent and verifiable experience in information security and adversary simulation
Detailed knowledge of global cyber threats, threat actors, and the tactics, techniques and procedures used by cyber adversaries, specifically those targeting the financial services sector
Experience with Red, Blue, or Purple teaming exercises
Industry certifications such as OSCP, OSCE, OSWE, GPEN, GCIH, GWAPT, or GXPN
Five + years cyber security engineering experience
Ability to define and communicate complex technical risk problems, concepts and situations to multiple skill levels; including business personnel with little to no cyber experience
Proficiency with Microsoft Office, Preference given to candidates with deep Excel and PowerPoint skill sets
Experience with systems such as Service Now, JIRA, and equivalent
Ability to fluently read, write and speak English
Experience with leading group discussion and presenting to varying levels and audiences
Self-motivated and self-management skills
Preferred Skills, Education and Certifications:
Strong knowledge of Penetration Testing and covert Red Team operations and Information Security demonstrated by one or more of the following:
Bachelor degree in Information/Cyber Security, Information Risk, Information Risk Management or equivalent experience
Bachelor degree in Information Systems, Computer Science, Information Management or similar four year technical degree or equivalent experience, combined with one or more of the following:
Active Cyber Security certifications
Experience in Insurance, Payments, Banking or other Fin-Tech Industries
Strong preference for candidate with excellent Excel and PowerPoint skills
Offers
Brand new office at excellent location;
Training and career opportunities;
Competitive salary
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest

Felsőfokú végzettség

Teszt Koordinátor
Feladatok
Aktív részvétel a nemzetközi használatra szánt belső teszt rendszerek specifikációjának elkészítésében
Követelmények meghatározása az új termék tesztelési és első beüzemelési folyamatokhoz, együttműködve az új termék bevezetését végző gyárak termelési és K+F területeivel
Új termékek bevezetésének támogatása EOL-t érintő témákban
A vágóasztalok teszteléséhez és indításához szükséges hardver és szoftver igények és az ehhez kapcsolódó költségek tervezése
A tesztelési és termékindítási folyamatok programozása és tervezése
Gyártásban történő szériatesztelés támogatása
A teszteléssel foglalkozó csapat támogatása új üzembehelyezésnél és a sorozatgyártás során
Partnerünk Magyarország legnagyobb mezőgazdasági gépgyártó vállalata keresi új kollégáját Törökszentmiklósra, teszt koordinátor pozícióba.
Követelmények
Mechatronikai/villamosmérnöki/gépészmérnöki végzettség
Legalább 3 év gyártási környezetben szerzett szakmai tapasztalat műszaki területen
Elektronikus és hidraulikus rendszerek ismerete
Folyékony angol nyelvtudás
Utazási hajlandóság
Előnyt jelent:
Hasonló pozícióban, autóipari ipari cégnél szerzett tapasztalat
Német nyelvtudás
Kommunikációs hálózatok ismerete(CAN, Ethernet stb.)
Amit ajánlunk
Szakmailag kiemelkedő csapat
Nemzetközi szinten magas színvonalú technológiai háttér
Folyamatos szakmai, egyénre szabott képzések
Munkavégzés helye
Törökszentmiklós

Felsőfokú végzettség

angol - középfokú
Our prestigious German client operates as an unique electronic and software developer competence center, specialized in the field of electronic steering systems, they are one of the leading multinational companies in the automotive industry, whose main focus is to create and provide high-tech development solutions to its partners.
Embedded developer
Feladatok
Full cycle ECU (Electrical Control Unit) development, servo control supplement and operation system development in embedded C
Plan and execute embedded systems, prepare software requirements
Implementing and integrating requests coming from clients (automotive industry), internal electronics development and testing
Documentation considering security processes, delivering technical design, end-to-end software implementation, module level testing in C
Keep in touch with architects, software integrators and project leaders
Követelmények
Electrical Engineer or IT degree (BSc/MSc)
On medior level 2-3+ years of embedded development background
Knowledge of analog and digital hardware for hardware-based programming
Knowledge of measuring tools for developing and testing
Fluent English is a must, German not required but nice to have it
Experience in MATLAB/Simulink/Python/AUTOSAR/MISRA C is an advantage
Engine control system or test system development background is also a plus
Amit kínálunk
Mentor programming, have the chance to learn from the most experienced colleagues
Flexible working time
Amazing social environment with friendly, smart and helpful colleagues
Participating in international projects
Providing language courses
Competitive salary and other benefits

SAP ABAP fejlesztő - Jó angol vagy német tudással -
Külföldi projektek - Remote is - A/V
/* Full time|| Junior és Senior SAP ABAP fejlesztő || Remote */
Partnerünk fejlesztői csapatába keresünk motivált, érdeklődő junior és nagy tapasztalattal rendelkező SAP ABAP fejlesztőket akár remote munkavégzéssel, hosszú távra!
Nem idegen számodra az SAP-n belül az ABAP fejlesztés? Tudsz angolul vagy németül - esetleg mindkét nyelven?
Akkor Rád van szükségünk!
Bővítjük csapatukat!
Ne aggódj! Kihívásban itt lesz részed: ABAP, UI5, Fiori és HANA van jelenleg terítéken, főleg német ügyfelek számára.
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest, 9. kerület vagy remote

Software Architect for IoT Devices (Budapest)
Software Architect for IoT Devices (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Hays Hungary Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Software Architect for IoT Devices
Your new role
We are looking for a motivated and experienced Software Architect to define and setup together with lead architects a common IoT Device and Asset Management solution for rolling stock subsystems, with focus on Rail Freight Automation and Telematics. You will also define how to integrate an IoT Device Management approach in rolling stock workshop procedures (commissioning, maintenance, operation, warehouse). You will be part of a new team that will focus on the development of new Digital Products and Services which will have a huge impact on the future of rail freight in Europe. 
Clarify, record, and prioritize device management requirements in coordination with customers and internal stakeholders 
On this basis, develop concept and elements of the software architecture, drive the selection of components 
Coordinate the implementation, handle technical problems, make technical decisions 
Ensure the timely availability of new functions, breaking down the milestones in actionable stories that engineers can understand 
In cooperation with international teams, integrate device management into the IoT landscape to combine all necessary services for customers 
Manage product backlog, priorities and timelines 
Work together with teams in Europe and India 
Travel occasionally
What you'll need to succeed
Degree in Software Engineering, Electrical Engineering or Computer Science 
Strong experience in IoT Device Management solutions 
Experience in the development of cloud-based systems 
Experience in requirement engineering 
Excellent verbal and written communication 
Proficient English language skills
BENEFITS 
Competitive salary and benefits package 
Participation in international projects 
3 home office days / week 
Professional development opportunities 
Possibility to participate in conferences and trainings
PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS 
Knowledge in Cybersecurity topics 
Protocol Stack knowledge like TR069-UL, LwM2M or OMA-DM 
An understanding of the complete device life cycle 
Background in railway, automotive or automation industry 
German language skills 
What you'll get in return
Competitive salary and benefits package
Participation in international projects
3 home office days / week
Professional development opportunities
Possibility to participate in conferences and trainings
What you need to do now
If you're interested in this role, click 'apply now' to forward an up-to-date copy of your CV, or call us now.
If this job isn't quite right for you but you are looking for a new position, please contact us for a confidential discussion on your career.

SAP Ariba Expert
Tasks in new position:

Have to fulfill the requirements, coming from the business
Must be able to communicate with solution architects
Need to know the SAP purchasing module, and work with the interfaces
Supporting the roll out of ARIBA
Responsibilities:

Creation of programming requests for our internal development team or for external programmers
Steering of external consultants and / or developers
Testing
Support of processes in the area of purchasing
User support, incident handling and standard service fulfillment
Participation in the S/4 rollout
Our fast-growing client is searching for SAP consultants with deep experties to their newly set-up IT team.

Deep SAP knowledge (S/4 preferred) in SAP purchasing processes and in SAP Ariba including the interfaces between both

Have experience in end-to-end counseling related to SAP ARIBA
3 or more years of experience

Test Engineer
Leírás
Megbízó partnerünk számára keresünk munkatársat, Test Engineer pozícióba szegedi lokációval. Partnerünk Európa egyik legnagyobb mérnöki és technológiai csoportja, Magyarország vezető informatikai cége.
Test Engineer
Feladatok

Hibák keresése és jelentése,

A meglévő automatizált tesztesetek karbantartása,
Tesztautomatizálási keretrendszer karbantartása és fejlesztése,
Tesztfolyamatok fejlesztésében aktív részvétel,
Agilis scrum csapattal szoros együttműködés.
Elvárások
Szoftverfejlesztő vagy kapcsolódó szakirányú végzettség,
Releváns, minimum 3 éves szakmai tapasztalat,
Programozási tapasztalat,
Hatékony munkavégzés önállóan és csapatban egyaránt,
Angol középfokú nyelvtudás.
Pozíció betöltéséhez előny:
ISTQB tanúsítvány,
C#/OOP ismeret,
Visual Studio, Azure DevOps területén szerzett tapasztalat,
Nemzetközi területen szerzett tapasztalat,
Jó kommunikációs és problémamegoldó készség,
Automatizálási és HMI területen szerzett tapasztalat.
Amit kínálunk
Vonzó kompenzációs csomag,
Magán egészségbiztosítás a Medicovernél,
Home office lehetőség és rugalmas munkaidő,
Parkolási bérlet,
Fiatal, dinamikus, támogató csapat mentorral,
Modern munkakörnyezet,
Nemzetközi projektekben való részvétel lehetősége,
200+ képzési lehetőség: Nyelvi, soft-skill és technikai tréningek,
Karrierlehetőségek,
Családbarát munkahely.

Modelling Engineer (Budapest)
Modelling Engineer (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Trenkwalder Kft.
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
1 - 2 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
távmunka, home office
angol - középfokú
angol - felsőfokú
Modelling Engineer
Leírás
Our parner are more than just an energy technology company. They meet the growing energy demand across 90+ countries while ensuring their climate is protected. With more than 92,000 dedicated employees, they not only generate electricity for over 16% of the global community, but they are also using their technology to help protect people and the environment.  Modelling Engineer  Feladatok Evaluation of contract and project boundary conditionsSetup of project execution scheduleEvaluation of engineering documents, e. g. P&IDs, isometric drawings, heat balance diagrams, power plant component design data, component detailed drawings and signal lists of the distributed control systemCommissioning of the system on the applicable power plant server on premiseQuality Check of the installation and the installations environmentPreparation of customer documentationTraining of the customers, mostly remote, sometimes on-site  Elvárások  Fluent English language skillsBachelor's or Master's degree in mechanical or electrical engineeringYou have experience in maintenance activities in power plants or oil and gas facilities (3-4 years on site in operation and maintenance or commissioning)You have knowledge of design of power plants / power plant components and how they function (gas/steam turbines, boilers, pumps, any rotating equipment)Basic knowledge in maintenance strategy development and Failure Mode and Effects Analysis (FMEA)Basic knowledge of Distributed Controls Systems (DCS) and data historiansBasic knowledge of IT systems (CMMS or similar, MS Office)Very good communication skills with customers and internal / external partnersHigh resilience, flexibility, enjoy familiarizing with new products and processes  Amit kínálunk  Competitive salary level (based on your professional background)Other benefits: cafeteria, yearly bonusWork in a friendly, modern environmentFlexible working hours - work-life balance providedTraining opportunitiesTeam building events, fruit days, health care programmes in the companyThe position also involves travel, 1-2 times a year (2-4 weeks)

Our client is a major supplier of quality electrical components to the European Automotive industry. They are looking for a front-end developer with a solid background in the web applications field.
Front-end Developer
Tasks
Create user friendly user interface for our processes
Design and develop web applications
Identify and make suggestions for improvements
Work with other team members to create good quality, effective business applications
Deliver user specified reports and online management information, following
appropriate analysis and process review
Adhere to the company’s IT policies and standards, making recommendations for
improvements
Such other comparable duties as may be required by the Head of Department 
Requirements
Information Technology degree
Technical skills: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Angular2, Good T-SQL skills
Fluency in English
JOB VACANCY
Self-motivated and proactive approach
Ability to work on your own initiative, enjoying innovation and change
Driving licence 
3 years of experience with SQL is an advantage
Offers

Attractive salary package (cafeteria, private pension fund, commuting allowance with a wider range than mandatory)
Home office opportunity – 2 days per a week in line with actual corporate home office
policy
Trainings and carrier opportunities
Multinational environment

Enterprise architect (Budapest)
Enterprise architect (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›
Randstad Hungary Kft
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
távmunka, home office
angol - középfokú
Multinacionális partnercégünk a magyar biztosítói piac vezetője, globálisan pedig 140 000 munkatárssal állnak 86 millió ügyfél rendelkezésére.
A magyar operációt kiszolgáló informatikai csapat bővülése kapcsán keressük a leendő Enterprise Architect kollégát.
Enterprise architect
Feladatok
Főbb feladatok:
IT architektúra tervezése, modellezése;
IT stratégia kialakításában való aktív részvétel;
Régiós, külső szolgáltatások integrálásának tervezése, támogatása;
Hazai és nemzetközi projektekben való részvétel;
Informatikai fejlesztések támogatása és felügyelete.
Követelmények
Elvárások:
Felsőfokú informatikai végzettség;
3 éves, multinacionális vállalatnál vagy biztosítónál szerzett tapasztalat;
Aktív, magabiztos angol nyelvtudás (szóban és írásban egyaránt);
Többrétegű architektúra ismerete, felhő alapú technológiákban való jártasság (pl. MS Azure, Openshift, Docker, Kubernet);
Enterprise architektúrában való jártasság, fejlesztési módszertan ismeretek;
Határozott, eredményorientált személyiség;
Problémamegoldó képesség, gyakorlatias gondolkodás, folyamatszemlélet
Amit kínálunk
Stabil vállalati háttér;
Versenyképes fizetés;
Éves prémium;
Lehetőség munkavégzésre környező országok operációiban;
All You Can Move kártya támogatás;
Home office;
Szakmai képzések (LinkedIn Learning)
Munkavégzés helye

Angular Developer (Medior/ Senior) (Budapest)
Jelentkezem az állásra ›

3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Angular Developer (Medior/ Senior)
We are looking to hire a great Angular Developer to join our Partner's dynamic team. You will be responsible for creating a top-level coding-base using Angular best practices.
About this position
Develop web applications in a team (solutions based on using the newest technologies) Design and estimate user stories, participate in the system design Design user interfaces and functions as planned Participate in product roadmap design Recognize different industries, developing applications which are used in the environment of small and large companies Write unit and end-to-end tests, participate in developer testing Stay up to date with current technology trends in web development
Requirements
3+ years of experience in web development English knowledge – Professional working proficiency Overall knowledge of the Angular framework (eg.: performance; component, pipe, service types and their life cycles; forms, change detection; SSR) HTML, SASS, UI framework knowledge (eg.: Bootstrap, Material, PrimeNG) State management (eg.: NgRx, Akita) Comprehensive knowledge of RxJS (eg.: observable and subject types, operators, error-handling) Unit/E2E testingNice to Have: Other frontend technologies (React, Vue.js) Knowledge of backend technologies (NodeJS, .Net Core, Java) Microservices DevOps, Cloud, Serverless Experience/Interest in other platforms, eg.: cross-platform, mobile development
Offer
Competitive salary in an innovative company To be a part of a creative and progressive team Hybrid-way of working Continuous learning opportunities

Mobile Application Tester (Budapest)
Mobile Application Tester (Budapest)
A hirdetés már lejárt!
Randstad Hungary Kft
Alapvető elvárások
IT, telekommunikáció
3 - 5 év tapasztalat
beosztott
Felsőfokú végzettség
teljes munkaidő
angol - középfokú
Our partner is an IT security company based in Switzerland. They have been on the market for over 20 years, providing security solutions of renowned customers in the area of banking, insurance, and government. Their product portfolio is being further developed and adapted to new technology trends to meet the constantly evolving requirements of digitalization, this is why they are lookig for a new
MOBILE APPLICATION TESTER
Mobile Application Tester
Tasks
In your daily work, you will
design, execute and document test cases for our IT security product suite (with special focus on native mobile apps)
actively participate in all stages of the agile development cycle, cooperate with product owners, engineering managers, software engineers, business analysts and fellow testers
test new functionalities, enhancements, bug-fixes, infrastructure changes, etc. in products to make sure they match the quality requirements
participate and potentially coordinate our testing guild, which synchronizes testing related activities and best practices
seek for tooling and testing process optimization, document the know-how for other testers and software engineers on a regular basis
Requirements
Requirements you should ideally fulfill:
at least 3 years of experience in software testing
experience in native and cross-platform mobile testing
experience in test automation with RoboScript or Selenium or similar test automation frameworks
a good command of English (written and spoken)
experience with working in agile teams
a communicative and open personality
university degree in a related field
Offers
What our partner offers:
Remote work opportunity and flexible working hours
extensive renumeration package including an annual bonus, company mobile and laptop, private health insurance, private nursery and kindergarten support etc.
International environment with a small friendly team
Self-development support with sponsored trainings
Half-day vacation for 24th of December and 31st of December
24/7 Employee Assistance Program (psychological and well being support, advices on finance and legal topics)
Workplace
Budapest
